namespace = DG_Papacy
country_event = { 
	id = DG_Papacy.001
	title = "DG_Papacy.001.title"
	desc = "DG_Papacy.001.desc"
	picture = catholic_college_of_cardinals
	is_triggered_only = yes
	hidden = yes
	immediate = { 
		hidden_effect = { 
			every_province = { 
				limit = { 
					AND = { 
						OR = { 
							is_city = yes
							is_colony = yes
						}
						NOT = { 
							province_id = 5154
						}
					}
					OR = { 
						religion = catholic
						religion = avignonist
					}
					has_cardinal = yes
				}
				set_province_flag = AI_Pulse
				AAA = { 
					trigger_switch = { 
						on_trigger = has_country_flag
						triannual1 = { 
							PREV = { 
								if = { 
									limit = { 
										AND = { 
											check_variable = { 
												which = aab
												value = 3200
											}
										}
									}
									clr_province_flag = AI_Pulse
								}
							}
						}
						triannual2 = { 
							PREV = { 
								if = { 
									limit = { 
										NOT = { 
											AND = { 
												check_variable = { 
													which = aab
													value = 3200
												}
											}
										}
										AND = { 
											check_variable = { 
												which = aab
												value = 1400
											}
										}
									}
									clr_province_flag = AI_Pulse
								}
							}
						}
						triannual3 = { 
							PREV = { 
								if = { 
									limit = { 
										NOT = { 
											AND = { 
												check_variable = { 
													which = aab
													value = 1400
												}
											}
										}
									}
									clr_province_flag = AI_Pulse
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
				if = { 
					limit = { 
						NOT = { 
							has_province_flag = AI_Pulse
						}
					}
					if = { 
						limit = { 
							religion = catholic
						}
						PAP = { 
							set_variable = { 
								which = kdt
								value = 0
							}
							set_variable = { 
								which = kdu
								value = 0
							}
							set_variable = { 
								which = kdv
								value = 0
							}
							set_variable = { 
								which = kdw
								value = 0
							}
							set_variable = { 
								which = kdx
								value = 0
							}
							set_variable = { 
								which = nto
								value = 0
							}
						}
						save_event_target_as = CardinalProv
						every_known_country = { 
							limit = { 
								OR = { 
									religion = catholic
									religion = protestant
									religion = reformed
									religion = hussite
									religion = waldensian
									religion = lollard
									religion = avignonist
									religion = holyleague
								}
							}
							PAP = { 
								change_variable = { 
									which = kdt
									value = 1
								}
							}
							if = { 
								limit = { 
									religion = event_target:CardinalProv
								}
								PAP = { 
									change_variable = { 
										which = kdu
										value = 1
									}
								}
							}
							every_owned_province = { 
								limit = { 
									OR = { 
										religion = catholic
										religion = protestant
										religion = reformed
										religion = hussite
										religion = waldensian
										religion = lollard
										religion = avignonist
										religion = holyleague
									}
								}
								PAP = { 
									change_variable = { 
										which = kdv
										value = 0.1
									}
								}
								if = { 
									limit = { 
										owned_by = PAP
									}
									PAP = { 
										change_variable = { 
											which = kdw
											value = 0.1
										}
									}
								}
								if = { 
									limit = { 
										religion = event_target:CardinalProv
									}
									PAP = { 
										change_variable = { 
											which = kdx
											value = 0.1
										}
									}
									trigger_switch = { 
										on_trigger = has_province_flag
										MN_Archbishopric = { 
											PAP = { 
												change_variable = { 
													which = kdx
													value = 0.05
												}
											}
										}
										MN_Patriarchate = { 
											PAP = { 
												change_variable = { 
													which = kdx
													value = 0.01
												}
											}
										}
									}
								}
							}
						}
						PAP = { 
							if = { 
								limit = { 
									NOT = { 
										AND = { 
											is_variable_equal = { 
												which = kdt
												value = 0
											}
										}
									}
								}
								divide_variable = { 
									which = kdu
									which = kdt
								}
								multiply_variable = { 
									which = kdu
									value = 200
								}
								set_variable = { 
									which = nto
									which = kdu
								}
							}
							if = { 
								limit = { 
									NOT = { 
										AND = { 
											is_variable_equal = { 
												which = kdv
												value = 0
											}
										}
									}
								}
								divide_variable = { 
									which = kdx
									which = kdv
								}
							}
							multiply_variable = { 
								which = kdx
								value = 200
							}
							change_variable = { 
								which = nto
								which = kdx
							}
							if = { 
								limit = { 
									NOT = { 
										AND = { 
											is_variable_equal = { 
												which = kni
												value = 1
											}
										}
									}
								}
								change_variable = { 
									which = nto
									value = -25
								}
							}
							if = { 
								limit = { 
									NOT = { 
										AND = { 
											is_variable_equal = { 
												which = knj
												value = 1
											}
										}
									}
								}
								change_variable = { 
									which = nto
									value = -25
								}
							}
							if = { 
								limit = { 
									NOT = { 
										AND = { 
											is_variable_equal = { 
												which = knr
												value = 1
											}
										}
									}
								}
								change_variable = { 
									which = nto
									value = -25
								}
							}
							if = { 
								limit = { 
									NOT = { 
										AND = { 
											is_variable_equal = { 
												which = knw
												value = 1
											}
										}
									}
								}
								change_variable = { 
									which = nto
									value = -25
								}
							}
							if = { 
								limit = { 
									is_religion_enabled = waldensian
								}
								change_variable = { 
									which = nto
									value = -25
								}
							}
							if = { 
								limit = { 
									is_religion_enabled = lollard
								}
								change_variable = { 
									which = nto
									value = -25
								}
							}
							if = { 
								limit = { 
									is_religion_enabled = hussite
								}
								change_variable = { 
									which = nto
									value = -25
								}
							}
							if = { 
								limit = { 
									is_religion_enabled = protestant
								}
								change_variable = { 
									which = nto
									value = -25
								}
							}
							if = { 
								limit = { 
									is_religion_enabled = reformed
								}
								change_variable = { 
									which = nto
									value = -25
								}
							}
							if = { 
								limit = { 
									OR = { 
										has_country_flag = French_Curia
										has_country_flag = Italian_Curia
										has_country_flag = Iberian_Curia
										has_country_flag = Imperial_Curia
										has_country_flag = English_Curia
									}
								}
								multiply_variable = { 
									which = nto
									value = 0.50
								}
							}
							else_if = { 
								limit = { 
									NOT = { 
										has_global_flag = DG_Live_Pope_in_Rome
									}
								}
								multiply_variable = { 
									which = nto
									value = 0.50
								}
							}
							else_if = { 
								limit = { 
									has_global_flag = DG_Live_Pope_in_Rome
									is_papal_controller = yes
								}
								change_variable = { 
									which = nto
									value = 100
								}
							}
							if = { 
								limit = { 
									has_country_flag = Pious_Pope
								}
								multiply_variable = { 
									which = nto
									value = 1.10
								}
							}
							else_if = { 
								limit = { 
									has_country_flag = Corrupt_Pope
								}
								multiply_variable = { 
									which = nto
									value = 0.90
								}
							}
							if = { 
								limit = { 
									NOT = { 
										AND = { 
											check_variable = { 
												which = nto
												value = 1
											}
										}
									}
								}
								set_variable = { 
									which = nto
									value = 1
								}
							}
							set_variable = { 
								which = kdt
								value = 0
							}
							set_variable = { 
								which = kdu
								value = 0
							}

								which = kdv
								value = 0

								which = kdw
								value = 0

								which = kdx

					else_if = {

							religion = avignonist
						}
						AVI = { 
							set_variable = { 
								which = kdt
								value = 0
							}

								which = kdu
								value = 0

					if = {

							OR = { 
								owned_by = PAP

								AND = { 
									check_variable = { 
										which = njc
										value = 50
									}

							}

						if = { 
							limit = { 
								OR = { 
									AND = { 
										religion = catholic
										owner = { 
											religion = catholic
										}
									}
									AND = { 
										religion = avignonist
										owner = { 
											religion = avignonist
										}
									}
								}
								has_cardinal = no
								NOT = { 
									AAA = { 
										AND = { 
											check_variable = { 
												which = nje
												value = 50
											}
										}
									}
								}
							}
							add_cardinal = yes
							hidden_effect = { 
								owner = { 
									add_papal_influence = 5
								}
								AAA = { 
									change_variable = { 
										which = nje
										value = 1
									}
								}
							}
						}
					}
					else = { 
						remove_cardinal = yes
						hidden_effect = { 
							AAA = { 
								change_variable = { 
									which = nje
									value = -1
								}
							}
						}
						if = { 
							limit = { 
								owner = { 
									AND = { 
										check_variable = { 
											which = njc
											value = 50
										}
									}
								}
								AND = { 
									check_variable = { 
										which = njc
										value = 50
									}
								}
							}
							if = { 
								limit = { 
									OR = { 
										AND = { 
											religion = catholic
											owner = { 
												religion = catholic
											}
										}
										AND = { 
											religion = avignonist
											owner = { 
												religion = avignonist
											}
										}
									}
									has_cardinal = no

												check_variable = { 
													which = nje
													value = 50
												}
											}
										}
									}
								}
								add_cardinal = yes
								hidden_effect = { 
									owner = { 
										add_papal_influence = 5
									}
									AAA = { 
										change_variable = { 
											which = nje
											value = 1
										}
									}
								}
							}
						}
						else_if = { 
							limit = { 
								owner = { 
									AND = { 
										check_variable = { 
											which = njc
											value = 50
										}
									}
								}
							}
							owner = { 
								random_owned_province = { 
									limit = { 
										AND = { 
											check_variable = { 
												which = njc
												value = 50
											}
										}
									}
									if = { 
										limit = { 
											OR = {

							}
						}
						else_if = { 
							limit = { 
								owner = { 
									any_known_country = { 
										AND = { 
											check_variable = { 
												which = njc
												value = 50
											}
										}
									}
								}
							}
							owner = { 
								random_known_country = { 
									limit = { 
										religion = PREV
										AND = { 
											check_variable = { 
												which = njc
												value = 50
											}
										}
									}
									random_owned_province = { 
										limit = { 
											AND = { 
												check_variable = { 
													which = njc
													value = 50
												}
											}
										}
										if = { 
											limit = { 
												OR = { 
													AND = { 
														religion = catholic
														owner = { 
															religion = catholic
														}
													}
													AND = { 
														religion = avignonist
														owner = { 
															religion = avignonist
														}
													}
												}
												has_cardinal = no
												NOT = { 
													AAA = { 
														AND = { 
															check_variable = { 
																which = nje
																value = 50
															}
														}
													}
												}
											}
											add_cardinal = yes
											hidden_effect = { 
												owner = { 
													add_papal_influence = 5
												}
												AAA = { 
													change_variable = { 
														which = nje
														value = 1
													}
												}
											}
										}
									}
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
			random_list = { 
				75 = { 
					random_country = { 
						limit = { 
							OR = { 
								religion = catholic
								religion = avignonist
							}
							AND = { 
								check_variable = { 
									which = njc
									value = 50
								}
							}
						}
						random_owned_province = { 
							limit = { 
								religion = PREV
								AND = { 
									check_variable = { 
										which = njc
										value = 50
									}
								}
							}
							if = { 
								limit = { 
									OR = { 
										AND = { 
											religion = catholic
											owner = { 
												religion = catholic
											}
										}
										AND = { 
											religion = avignonist
											owner = { 
												religion = avignonist
											}
										}
									}
									has_cardinal = no
									NOT = { 
										AAA = { 
											AND = { 
												check_variable = { 
													which = nje
													value = 50
												}
											}
										}
									}
								}
								add_cardinal = yes
								hidden_effect = { 
									owner = { 
										add_papal_influence = 5
									}
									AAA = { 
										change_variable = { 
											which = nje
											value = 1
										}
									}
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
				25 = { }
			}
		}
	}
	option = { 
		name = "DG_Papacy.001.opta"
	}
}
country_event = { 
	id = DG_Papacy.101
	title = "no_localisation"
	desc = "no_localisation"
	picture = catholic_college_of_cardinals
	is_triggered_only = yes
	trigger = { 
		NOT = { 
			has_global_flag = DG_Western_Schism_Start
		}
		NOT = { 
			has_country_flag = Conclave_Underway
		}
		NOT = { 
			has_regency = yes
		}
		OR = { 
			AND = { 
				tag = PAP
				religion = catholic
				has_global_flag = DG_Live_Pope_in_Rome
			}
			AND = { 
				tag = AVI
				religion = avignonist
				has_global_flag = DG_Live_Pope_in_Avignon
			}
		}
	}
	immediate = { 
		hidden_effect = { 
			set_country_flag = Conclave_Underway
			clr_country_flag = Pious_Pope
			clr_country_flag = Secular_Pope
			clr_country_flag = Corrupt_Pope
			clr_country_flag = accepted_graft
			clr_country_flag = refused_graft
			export_to_variable = { 
				which = export
				value = corruption
			}
			set_variable = { 
				which = ntf
				which = export
			}
			multiply_variable = { 
				which = ntf
				value = 0.10
			}
			random_list = { 
				10 = { 
					multiply_variable = { 
						which = ntf
						value = 0.75
					}
				}
				10 = { 
					multiply_variable = { 
						which = ntf
						value = 0.80
					}
				}
				10 = { 
					multiply_variable = {

						value = 0.85
					}
				}
				10 = { 
					multiply_variable = { 
						which = ntf
						value = 0.90
					}
				}
				10 = { 
					multiply_variable = { 
						which = ntf
						value = 0.95
					}
				}
				10 = { 
					multiply_variable = { 
						which = ntf
						value = 1.00
					}
				}
				10 = { 
					multiply_variable = { 
						which = ntf
						value = 1.05
					}
				}
				10 = { 
					multiply_variable = { 
						which = ntf
						value = 1.10
					}
				}
				10 = { 
					multiply_variable = { 
						which = ntf
						value = 1.15
					}
				}
				10 = { 
					multiply_variable = { 
						which = ntf
						value = 1.20
					}
				}
				10 = { 
					multiply_variable = { 
						which = ntf
						value = 1.25
					}
				}
			}
			if = { 
				limit = { 
					AND = { 
						is_variable_equal = { 
							which = knl
							value = 1
						}
					}
				}
				change_variable = { 
					which = ntf
					value = 1
				}
			}
			else_if = { 
				limit = { 
					AND = { 
						is_variable_equal = { 
							which = knl
							value = 3
						}
					}
				}
				change_variable = { 
					which = ntf
					value = -1
				}
			}
			if = { 
				limit = { 
					AND = { 
						is_variable_equal = { 
							which = kns
							value = 3
						}
					}
				}
				change_variable = { 
					which = ntf
					value = 1
				}
			}
			else_if = { 
				limit = { 
					AND = { 
						is_variable_equal = { 
							which = kns
							value = 1
						}
					}
				}
				change_variable = { 
					which = ntf
					value = -1
				}
			}
			if = { 
				limit = { 
					AND = { 
						is_variable_equal = { 
							which = knv
							value = 4
						}
					}
				}
				change_variable = { 
					which = ntf
					value = 1
				}
			}
			else_if = { 
				limit = { 
					AND = { 
						is_variable_equal = { 
							which = knv
							value = 3
						}
					}
				}
				change_variable = { 
					which = ntf
					value = -1
				}
			}
			if = { 
				limit = { 
					OR = { 
						has_country_flag = accepted_graft
						OR = { 
							has_country_flag = French_Curia
							has_country_flag = Italian_Curia
							has_country_flag = Iberian_Curia
							has_country_flag = Imperial_Curia
							has_country_flag = English_Curia
						}
					}
				}
				change_variable = { 
					which = ntf
					value = 2
				}
			}
			else_if = { 
				limit = { 
					has_country_flag = refused_graft
				}
				change_variable = { 
					which = ntf
					value = -2
				}
			}
			if = {

					has_country_flag = Restricted_Curia

				change_variable = {

								religion = reformed

								religion = lollard
								religion = avignonist
								religion = holyleague
							}

								which = kdv
								value = 0.1
							}
						}

										}
									}
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
				PAP = { 
					if = {

								AND = { 
									is_variable_equal = { 
										which = kdt
										value = 0
									}
								}
							}
						}
						divide_variable = { 
							which = kdu
							which = kdt
						}
						multiply_variable = { 
							which = kdu
							value = 200
						}
						set_variable = {

					if = { 
						limit = { 
							is_religion_enabled = protestant
						}
						change_variable = { 
							which = nto
							value = -25
						}
					}
					if = { 
						limit = { 
							is_religion_enabled = reformed
						}
						change_variable = { 
							which = nto
							value = -25
						}
					}
					if = { 
						limit = { 
							OR = { 
								has_country_flag = French_Curia
								has_country_flag = Italian_Curia
								has_country_flag = Iberian_Curia
								has_country_flag = Imperial_Curia
								has_country_flag = English_Curia
							}
						}
						multiply_variable = { 
							which = nto
							value = 0.50
						}
					}
					else_if = { 
						limit = { 
							NOT = { 
								has_global_flag = DG_Live_Pope_in_Rome
							}
						}
						multiply_variable = { 
							which = nto
							value = 0.50
						}
					}
					else_if = { 
						limit = { 
							has_global_flag = DG_Live_Pope_in_Rome
							is_papal_controller = yes
						}
						change_variable = { 
							which = nto
							value = 100
						}
					}
					if = { 
						limit = { 
							has_country_flag = Pious_Pope
						}
						multiply_variable = { 
							which = nto
							value = 1.10
						}
					}
					else_if = { 
						limit = { 
							has_country_flag = Corrupt_Pope
						}
						multiply_variable = { 
							which = nto
							value = 0.90
						}
					}
					if = { 
						limit = { 
							NOT = { 
								AND = { 
									check_variable = { 
										which = nto
										value = 1
									}
								}
							}
						}
						set_variable = { 
							which = nto
							value = 1
						}
					}
					set_variable = { 
						which = kdt
						value = 0
					}
					set_variable = { 
						which = kdu
						value = 0
					}
					set_variable = { 
						which = kdv
						value = 0
					}
					set_variable = { 
						which = kdw
						value = 0
					}
					set_variable = { 
						which = kdx
						value = 0
					}
				}
			}
		}
		define_ruler = { 
			regency = yes
			name = "(Papal Conclave)"
			ADM = 2
			DIP = 2
			MIL = 1
		}
		log = "DG - Start of the Conclave"
		hidden_effect = { 
			random_province = { 
				limit = { 
					superregion = italy_superregion
					has_cardinal = yes
					religion = ROOT
				}
				save_global_event_target_as = preferiti_1
				ROOT = { 
					random_list = { 
						25 = { 
							set_country_flag = preferiti_1_pious
						}
						25 = { 
							set_country_flag = preferiti_1_secular
						}
						50 = { 
							set_country_flag = preferiti_1_corrupt
						}
					}
				}
			}
			random_province = { 
				limit = { 
					superregion = france_superregion
					has_cardinal = yes
					religion = ROOT
				}
				save_global_event_target_as = preferiti_2
				ROOT = { 
					random_list = { 
						25 = { 
							set_country_flag = preferiti_2_pious
						}
						25 = { 
							set_country_flag = preferiti_2_secular
						}
						50 = { 
							set_country_flag = preferiti_2_corrupt
						}
					}
				}
			}
			random_province = { 
				limit = { 
					OR = { 
						superregion = germany_superregion
						superregion = greater_austrian_circle_superregion
					}
					has_cardinal = yes
					religion = ROOT
				}
				save_global_event_target_as = preferiti_3
				ROOT = { 
					random_list = { 
						25 = { 
							set_country_flag = preferiti_3_pious
						}
						25 = { 
							set_country_flag = preferiti_3_secular
						}
						50 = { 
							set_country_flag = preferiti_3_corrupt
						}
					}
				}
			}
			random_province = { 
				limit = { 
					superregion = iberia_superregion
					has_cardinal = yes
					religion = ROOT
				}
				save_global_event_target_as = preferiti_4
				ROOT = { 
					random_list = { 
						25 = { 
							set_country_flag = preferiti_4_pious
						}
						25 = { 
							set_country_flag = preferiti_4_secular
						}
						50 = { 
							set_country_flag = preferiti_4_corrupt
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
	option = { 
		name = "DG_Papacy.101.opta"
		if = { 
			limit = { 
				OR = { 
					FRA = { 
						is_papal_controller = no
						is_previous_papal_controller = yes
					}
					PAP = { 
						is_papal_controller = yes
					}
				}
				has_global_flag = DG_Babylonian_Captivity_Ends
				NOT = { 
					has_ruler_flag = Captivity_Ending_Pope
				}
				has_country_flag = Divided_Conclave
				NOT = { 
					OR = { 
						has_global_flag = DG_Western_Schism_Mended
						has_global_flag = DG_Western_Schism_Defeated
						has_global_flag = DG_Western_Schism_Abdication
					}
				}
			}
			hidden_effect = { 
				PAP = { 
					set_ruler_flag = Divided_Conclave_Pope
					country_event = { 
						id = DG_Papacy.200
						days = 5
					}
				}
			}
		}
		else = { 
			if = { 
				limit = { 
					AND = { 
						is_subject = yes
						NOT = { 
							is_subject_of_type = tributary_state
						}
						NOT = { 
							is_subject_of_type = close_tributary_state
						}
					}
				}
				overlord = { 
					country_event = { 
						id = DG_Papacy.122
						days = 5
					}
				}
			}
			else = { 
				every_known_country = { 
					limit = { 
						religion = ROOT
						num_of_cardinals = 1
						is_excommunicated = no
					}
					country_event = { 
						id = DG_Papacy.103
						days = 15
						random = 3
					}
				}
				country_event = { 
					id = DG_Papacy.106
					days = 150
				}
			}
			every_country = { 
				limit = { 
					religion = ROOT
					ai = no
					has_country_flag = papacy_notification
				}
				country_event = { 
					id = DG_Papacy.102
					days = 4
				}
			}
		}
	}
}
country_event = { 
	id = DG_Papacy.102
	title = "DG_Papacy.102.title"
	desc = "DG_Papacy.102.desc"
	picture = catholic_habemus_papam
	is_triggered_only = yes
	option = { 
		name = "DG_Papacy.102.opta"
	}
}
country_event = { 
	id = DG_Papacy.103
	title = "DG_Papacy.103.title"
	desc = "DG_Papacy.103.desc"
	picture = catholic_habemus_papam
	is_triggered_only = yes
	option = { 
		name = "DG_Papacy.103.optc"
		hidden_effect = { 
			if = { 
				limit = { 
					religion = catholic
				}
				PAP = { 
					export_to_variable = { 
						which = export
						value = trigger_value:num_of_cardinals
						who = ROOT
					}
					set_variable = { 
						which = rht
						which = export
					}
					change_variable = { 
						which = puv
						which = rht
					}
					set_variable = { 
						which = rht
						value = 0
					}
				}
			}
			if = { 
				limit = { 
					religion = avignonist
				}
				AVI = { 
					export_to_variable = { 
						which = export
						value = trigger_value:num_of_cardinals
						who = ROOT
					}
					set_variable = { 
						which = rht
						which = export
					}
					change_variable = { 
						which = puv
						which = rht
					}
					set_variable = { 
						which = rht
						value = 0
					}
				}
			}
			set_country_flag = vote_pope_1
		}
		ai_chance = { 
			factor = 1
			modifier = { 
				factor = 2
				event_target:preferiti_1 = { 
					culture_group = ROOT
				}
			}
			modifier = { 
				factor = 3
				event_target:preferiti_1 = { 
					culture = ROOT
				}
			}
			modifier = { 
				factor = 3
				event_target:preferiti_1 = { 
					owner = { 
						alliance_with = ROOT
					}
				}
			}
			modifier = { 
				factor = 0.1
				event_target:preferiti_1 = { 
					owner = { 
						is_rival = ROOT
					}
				}
			}
			modifier = { 
				factor = 10
				event_target:preferiti_1 = { 
					owned_by = ROOT
				}
			}
			modifier = { 
				factor = 0
				event_target:preferiti_1 = { 
					owner = { 
						war_with = ROOT
					}
				}
			}
			modifier = { 
				factor = 3
				event_target:preferiti_1 = { 
					owner = { 
						is_subject_of = ROOT
					}
				}
			}
			modifier = { 
				factor = 3
				event_target:preferiti_1 = { 
					owner = { 
						overlord_of = ROOT
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}

				factor = 3
				event_target:preferiti_2 = { 
					owner = { 
						overlord_of = ROOT
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
	option = { 
		name = "DG_Papacy.103.opte"
		hidden_effect = { 
			if = { 
				limit = { 
					religion = catholic
				}
				PAP = { 
					export_to_variable = { 
						which = export
						value = trigger_value:num_of_cardinals
						who = ROOT
					}
					set_variable = { 
						which = rht
						which = export
					}
					change_variable = { 
						which = pux
						which = rht
					}
					set_variable = { 
						which = rht
						value = 0
					}
				}
			}
			if = { 
				limit = { 
					religion = avignonist
				}
				AVI = { 
					export_to_variable = { 
						which = export
						value = trigger_value:num_of_cardinals
						who = ROOT
					}
					set_variable = { 
						which = rht
						which = export
					}
					change_variable = { 
						which = pux
						which = rht
					}
					set_variable = { 
						which = rht
						value = 0
					}
				}
			}
			set_country_flag = vote_pope_3
		}
		ai_chance = { 
			factor = 1
			modifier = { 
				factor = 2
				event_target:preferiti_3 = { 
					culture_group = ROOT
				}
			}
			modifier = { 
				factor = 3
				event_target:preferiti_3 = { 
					culture = ROOT
				}
			}
			modifier = { 
				factor = 3
				event_target:preferiti_3 = { 
					owner = { 
						alliance_with = ROOT
					}
				}
			}
			modifier = { 
				factor = 0.1
				event_target:preferiti_3 = { 
					owner = { 
						is_rival = ROOT
					}
				}
			}
			modifier = { 
				factor = 10
				event_target:preferiti_3 = { 
					owned_by = ROOT
				}
			}
			modifier = { 
				factor = 0
				event_target:preferiti_3 = { 
					owner = { 
						war_with = ROOT
					}
				}
			}
			modifier = { 
				factor = 3
				event_target:preferiti_3 = { 
					owner = { 
						is_subject_of = ROOT
					}
				}
			}
			modifier = { 
				factor = 3
				event_target:preferiti_3 = { 
					owner = { 
						overlord_of = ROOT
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
	option = { 
		name = "DG_Papacy.103.optf"
		hidden_effect = { 
			if = { 
				limit = { 
					religion = catholic
				}
				PAP = {

						which = export

						which = puy
						which = rht

					}

						which = export

						which = puy

					}
					set_variable = { 
						which = rht
						value = 0
					}
				}
			}
			set_country_flag = vote_pope_4
		}
		ai_chance = { 
			factor = 1
			modifier = { 
				factor = 2
				event_target:preferiti_4 = { 
					culture_group = ROOT
				}
			}
			modifier = { 
				factor = 3
				event_target:preferiti_4 = { 
					culture = ROOT
				}
			}
			modifier = { 
				factor = 3
				event_target:preferiti_4 = { 
					owner = { 
						alliance_with = ROOT
					}
				}
			}
			modifier = { 
				factor = 0.1
				event_target:preferiti_4 = { 
					owner = { 
						is_rival = ROOT
					}
				}
			}
			modifier = { 
				factor = 10
				event_target:preferiti_4 = { 
					owned_by = ROOT
				}
			}
			modifier = { 
				factor = 0

					owner = { 
						war_with = ROOT
					}
				}
			}
			modifier = {

					owner = {

				}

			modifier = {

				event_target:preferiti_4 = { 
					owner = { 
						overlord_of = ROOT
					}
				}
			}
		}

country_event = { 
	id = DG_Papacy.104
	title = "DG_Papacy.104.title"
	desc = "DG_Papacy.104.desc"
	picture = catholic_habemus_papam
	is_triggered_only = yes
	option = { 
		name = "DG_Papacy.104.opta"
		trigger = { 
			PAP = { 
				OR = { 
					has_country_flag = preferiti_1_pious
					has_country_flag = preferiti_1_secular
				}
			}
		}
		hidden_effect = { 
			if = { 
				limit = { 
					religion = catholic
				}
				PAP = { 
					export_to_variable = { 
						which = export
						value = trigger_value:num_of_cardinals
						who = ROOT
					}
					set_variable = { 
						which = rht
						which = export
					}
					change_variable = { 
						which = puv
						which = rht
					}
					set_variable = { 
						which = rht
						value = 0
					}
				}
			}
			if = { 
				limit = { 
					religion = avignonist
				}
				AVI = { 
					export_to_variable = { 
						which = export
						value = trigger_value:num_of_cardinals
						who = ROOT
					}
					set_variable = { 
						which = rht
						which = export
					}
					change_variable = { 
						which = puv
						which = rht
					}
					set_variable = { 
						which = rht
						value = 0
					}
				}
			}
			set_country_flag = vote_pope_1
			if = { 
				limit = { 
					OR = { 
						tag = MLO
						tag = FIR
						tag = KNP
					}
				}
				PAP = { 
					set_variable = { 
						which = italian_vote
						value = 1
					}
				}
			}
			else_if = { 
				limit = { 
					tag = FRA
				}
				PAP = { 
					set_variable = { 
						which = french_vote
						value = 1
					}
				}
			}
			else_if = { 
				limit = { 
					is_emperor = yes
				}
				PAP = { 
					set_variable = { 
						which = imperial_vote
						value = 1
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
	option = { 
		name = "DG_Papacy.104.optb"
		trigger = { 
			PAP = { 
				OR = { 
					has_country_flag = preferiti_2_pious
					has_country_flag = preferiti_2_secular
				}

country_event = { 
	id = DG_Papacy.106
	title = "AI_Event"
	desc = "AI_Event"
	picture = catholic_habemus_papam
	hidden = yes
	is_triggered_only = yes
	immediate = { 
		clr_country_flag = Inconclusive_Vote
		hidden_effect = { 
			set_variable = { 
				which = pva
				value = 0
			}
			change_variable = { 
				which = pva
				which = puv
			}
			change_variable = { 
				which = pva
				which = puw
			}
			change_variable = { 
				which = pva
				which = pux
			}
			change_variable = { 
				which = pva
				which = puy
			}
			set_variable = { 
				which = kdt
				which = puv
			}
			set_variable = { 
				which = pvb
				value = 1
			}
			if = { 
				limit = { 
					AND = { 
						is_variable_equal = { 
							which = puw
							which = kdt
						}
					}
				}
				set_country_flag = Inconclusive_Vote
			}
			else_if = { 
				limit = { 
					AND = { 
						check_variable = { 
							which = puw
							which = kdt
						}
					}
				}
				set_variable = { 
					which = kdt
					which = puw
				}
				set_variable = { 
					which = pvb
					value = 2
				}
				clr_country_flag = Inconclusive_Vote
			}
			if = { 
				limit = { 
					AND = { 
						is_variable_equal = { 
							which = pux
							which = kdt
						}
					}
				}
				set_country_flag = Inconclusive_Vote
			}
			else_if = { 
				limit = { 
					AND = { 
						check_variable = { 
							which = pux
							which = kdt
						}
					}
				}
				set_variable = { 
					which = kdt
					which = pux
				}
				set_variable = { 
					which = pvb
					value = 3
				}
				clr_country_flag = Inconclusive_Vote
			}
			if = { 
				limit = { 
					AND = { 
						is_variable_equal = { 
							which = puy
							which = kdt
						}
					}
				}
				set_country_flag = Inconclusive_Vote
			}
			else_if = { 
				limit = { 
					AND = { 
						check_variable = { 
							which = puy
							which = kdt
						}
					}
				}
				set_variable = { 
					which = kdt
					which = puy
				}
				set_variable = { 
					which = pvb
					value = 4
				}
				clr_country_flag = Inconclusive_Vote
			}
			if = { 
				limit = { 
					has_country_flag = Inconclusive_Vote
					has_global_flag = DG_Ongoing_Schism_Council
				}
				set_global_flag = DG_Inconclusive_Vote
				set_variable = { 
					which = pvb
					value = 0
				}
				clr_country_flag = Inconclusive_Vote
			}
			set_variable = { 
				which = kdt
				value = 0
			}
		}
	}
	option = { 
		name = "AI_Event"
		trigger = { 
			AND = { 
				is_variable_equal = { 
					which = pvb
					value = 1
				}
			}
		}
		hidden_effect = { 
			clr_country_flag = preferiti_2_pious
			clr_country_flag = preferiti_2_secular
			clr_country_flag = preferiti_2_corrupt
			clr_country_flag = preferiti_3_pious
			clr_country_flag = preferiti_3_secular
			clr_country_flag = preferiti_3_corrupt
			clr_country_flag = preferiti_4_pious
			clr_country_flag = preferiti_4_secular
			clr_country_flag = preferiti_4_corrupt
		}
		if = { 
			limit = { 
				ROOT = { 
					has_country_flag = preferiti_1_pious
				}
			}
			event_target:preferiti_1 = { 
				owner = { 
					country_event = { 
						id = DG_Papacy.107
						days = 5
					}
				}
			}
		}
		else_if = { 
			limit = { 
				ROOT = { 
					has_country_flag = preferiti_1_secular
				}
			}
			event_target:preferiti_1 = { 
				owner = { 
					country_event = { 
						id = DG_Papacy.112
						days = 5
					}
				}
			}
		}
		else_if = { 
			limit = { 
				ROOT = { 
					has_country_flag = preferiti_1_corrupt
				}
			}
			event_target:preferiti_1 = { 
				owner = { 
					country_event = { 
						id = DG_Papacy.120
						days = 5
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
	option = { 
		name = "AI_Event"
		trigger = { 
			AND = { 
				is_variable_equal = { 
					which = pvb
					value = 2
				}
			}
		}
		hidden_effect = { 
			clr_country_flag = preferiti_1_pious
			clr_country_flag = preferiti_1_secular
			clr_country_flag = preferiti_1_corrupt
			clr_country_flag = preferiti_3_pious
			clr_country_flag = preferiti_3_secular
			clr_country_flag = preferiti_3_corrupt
			clr_country_flag = preferiti_4_pious
			clr_country_flag = preferiti_4_secular
			clr_country_flag = preferiti_4_corrupt
		}
		if = { 
			limit = { 
				ROOT = { 
					has_country_flag = preferiti_2_pious
				}
			}
			event_target:preferiti_2 = { 
				owner = { 
					country_event = { 
						id = DG_Papacy.107
						days = 5
					}
				}
			}
		}
		else_if = { 
			limit = { 
				ROOT = { 
					has_country_flag = preferiti_2_secular
				}
			}
			event_target:preferiti_2 = { 
				owner = {

				}
			}
		}

			event_target:preferiti_2 = { 
				owner = { 
					country_event = {

					}
				}
			}

		name = "AI_Event"
		trigger = { 
			AND = { 
				is_variable_equal = { 
					which = pvb
					value = 3
				}
			}
		}
		hidden_effect = {

			clr_country_flag = preferiti_1_secular
			clr_country_flag = preferiti_1_corrupt

	option = { 
		name = "AI_Event"
		trigger = { 
			has_country_flag = Inconclusive_Vote
		}
		every_known_country = { 
			limit = { 
				religion = ROOT
				num_of_cardinals = 1
				is_excommunicated = no
			}
			country_event = { 
				id = DG_Papacy.1033
				days = 15
				random = 3
			}
		}
		hidden_effect = { 
			set_variable = { 
				which = puv
				value = 0
			}
			set_variable = { 
				which = puw
				value = 0
			}
			set_variable = { 
				which = pux
				value = 0
			}
			set_variable = { 
				which = puy
				value = 0
			}
			set_variable = { 
				which = pva
				value = 0
			}
		}
		country_event = { 
			id = DG_Papacy.106
			days = 150
		}
	}
}
country_event = { 
	id = DG_Papacy.107
	title = "DG_Papacy.107.title"
	desc = { 
		trigger = { 
			religion = catholic
		}
		desc = DG_Papacy.107.desca
	}
	desc = { 
		trigger = { 
			religion = avignonist
		}
		desc = DG_Papacy.107.descb
	}
	picture = catholic_habemus_papam
	is_triggered_only = yes
	immediate = { 
		if = { 
			limit = { 
				FROM = { 
					has_country_flag = preferiti_1_pious
				}
			}
			FROM = { 
				set_papal_controller = ROOT
				set_ruler_culture = event_target:preferiti_1
				clr_country_flag = preferiti_1_pious
			}
		}
		else_if = { 
			limit = { 
				FROM = { 
					has_country_flag = preferiti_2_pious
				}
			}
			FROM = { 
				set_papal_controller = ROOT
				set_ruler_culture = event_target:preferiti_2
				clr_country_flag = preferiti_2_pious
			}
		}
		else_if = { 
			limit = { 
				FROM = { 
					has_country_flag = preferiti_3_pious
				}
			}
			FROM = { 
				set_papal_controller = ROOT
				set_ruler_culture = event_target:preferiti_3
				clr_country_flag = preferiti_3_pious
			}
		}
		else_if = { 
			limit = { 
				FROM = { 
					has_country_flag = preferiti_4_pious
				}
			}
			FROM = { 
				set_papal_controller = ROOT
				set_ruler_culture = event_target:preferiti_4
				clr_country_flag = preferiti_4_pious
			}
		}
		FROM = { 
			clr_country_flag = Deadlocked_Conclave
			set_country_flag = Pious_Pope
			if = { 
				limit = { 
					tag = PAP
				}
				set_global_flag = DG_Live_Pope_in_Rome
				hidden_effect = { 
					PAP = { 
						set_variable = { 
							which = kdt
							value = 0
						}
						set_variable = { 
							which = kdu
							value = 0
						}
						set_variable = { 
							which = kdv
							value = 0
						}
						set_variable = { 
							which = kdw
							value = 0
						}
						set_variable = { 
							which = kdx
							value = 0
						}
						set_variable = { 
							which = nto
							value = 0
						}
					}
					save_event_target_as = CardinalProv
					every_known_country = { 
						limit = { 
							OR = { 
								religion = catholic
								religion = protestant
								religion = reformed
								religion = hussite
								religion = waldensian
								religion = lollard
								religion = avignonist
								religion = holyleague
							}
						}
						PAP = { 
							change_variable = { 
								which = kdt
								value = 1
							}
						}
						if = { 
							limit = { 
								religion = event_target:CardinalProv
							}
							PAP = { 
								change_variable = { 
									which = kdu
									value = 1
								}
							}
						}
						every_owned_province = { 
							limit = { 
								OR = { 
									religion = catholic
									religion = protestant
									religion = reformed
									religion = hussite
									religion = waldensian
									religion = lollard
									religion = avignonist
									religion = holyleague
								}
							}
							PAP = { 
								change_variable = { 
									which = kdv
									value = 0.1
								}
							}
							if = { 
								limit = { 
									owned_by = PAP
								}
								PAP = { 
									change_variable = { 
										which = kdw
										value = 0.1
									}
								}
							}
							if = { 
								limit = { 
									religion = event_target:CardinalProv
								}
								PAP = { 
									change_variable = { 
										which = kdx
										value = 0.1
									}
								}
								trigger_switch = { 
									on_trigger = has_province_flag
									MN_Archbishopric = { 
										PAP = { 
											change_variable = { 
												which = kdx
												value = 0.05
											}
										}
									}
									MN_Patriarchate = { 
										PAP = { 
											change_variable = { 
												which = kdx
												value = 0.01
											}
										}
									}
								}
							}
						}
					}
					PAP = { 
						if = { 
							limit = { 
								NOT = { 
									AND = { 
										is_variable_equal = { 
											which = kdt
											value = 0
										}
									}
								}
							}
							divide_variable = { 
								which = kdu
								which = kdt
							}
							multiply_variable = { 
								which = kdu
								value = 200
							}
							set_variable = { 
								which = nto
								which = kdu
							}
						}
						if = { 
							limit = { 
								NOT = { 
									AND = { 
										is_variable_equal = { 
											which = kdv
											value = 0
										}
									}
								}
							}
							divide_variable = { 
								which = kdx
								which = kdv
							}
						}
						multiply_variable = { 
							which = kdx
							value = 200
						}
						change_variable = { 
							which = nto
							which = kdx
						}
						if = { 
							limit = { 
								NOT = { 
									AND = { 
										is_variable_equal = { 
											which = kni
											value = 1
										}
									}
								}
							}
							change_variable = { 
								which = nto
								value = -25
							}
						}
						if = { 
							limit = { 
								NOT = { 
									AND = { 
										is_variable_equal = { 
											which = knj
											value = 1
										}
									}
								}
							}
							change_variable = { 
								which = nto
								value = -25
							}
						}
						if = { 
							limit = { 
								NOT = { 
									AND = { 
										is_variable_equal = { 
											which = knr
											value = 1
										}
									}
								}
							}
							change_variable = { 
								which = nto
								value = -25
							}
						}
						if = { 
							limit = { 
								NOT = { 
									AND = { 
										is_variable_equal = { 
											which = knw
											value = 1
										}
									}
								}
							}
							change_variable = { 
								which = nto
								value = -25
							}
						}
						if = { 
							limit = { 
								is_religion_enabled = waldensian
							}
							change_variable = { 
								which = nto
								value = -25
							}
						}
						if = { 
							limit = { 
								is_religion_enabled = lollard
							}
							change_variable = { 
								which = nto
								value = -25
							}
						}
						if = { 
							limit = { 
								is_religion_enabled = hussite
							}
							change_variable = { 
								which = nto
								value = -25
							}
						}
						if = { 
							limit = { 
								is_religion_enabled = protestant
							}
							change_variable = { 
								which = nto
								value = -25
							}
						}
						if = { 
							limit = { 
								is_religion_enabled = reformed
							}
							change_variable = { 
								which = nto
								value = -25
							}
						}
						if = { 
							limit = { 
								OR = { 
									has_country_flag = French_Curia
									has_country_flag = Italian_Curia
									has_country_flag = Iberian_Curia
									has_country_flag = Imperial_Curia
									has_country_flag = English_Curia
								}
							}
							multiply_variable = { 
								which = nto
								value = 0.50
							}
						}
						else_if = { 
							limit = { 
								NOT = { 
									has_global_flag = DG_Live_Pope_in_Rome
								}
							}
							multiply_variable = { 
								which = nto
								value = 0.50
							}
						}
						else_if = { 
							limit = { 
								has_global_flag = DG_Live_Pope_in_Rome
								is_papal_controller = yes
							}
							change_variable = { 
								which = nto
								value = 100
							}
						}
						if = { 
							limit = { 
								has_country_flag = Pious_Pope
							}
							multiply_variable = { 
								which = nto
								value = 1.10
							}
						}
						else_if = { 
							limit = { 
								has_country_flag = Corrupt_Pope
							}
							multiply_variable = { 
								which = nto
								value = 0.90
							}
						}
						if = { 
							limit = { 
								NOT = { 
									AND = { 
										check_variable = { 
											which = nto
											value = 1
										}
									}
								}
							}
							set_variable = { 
								which = nto
								value = 1
							}
						}
						set_variable = { 
							which = kdt
							value = 0
						}
						set_variable = { 
							which = kdu
							value = 0
						}
						set_variable = { 
							which = kdv
							value = 0
						}
						set_variable = { 
							which = kdw
							value = 0
						}
						set_variable = { 
							which = kdx
							value = 0
						}
					}
					export_to_variable = { 
						which = export
						value = corruption
					}
					set_variable = { 
						which = ntf
						which = export
					}
					multiply_variable = { 
						which = ntf
						value = 0.10
					}
					random_list = { 
						10 = { 
							multiply_variable = { 
								which = ntf
								value = 0.75
							}
						}
						10 = { 
							multiply_variable = { 
								which = ntf
								value = 0.80
							}
						}
						10 = { 
							multiply_variable = { 
								which = ntf
								value = 0.85
							}
						}
						10 = { 
							multiply_variable = { 
								which = ntf
								value = 0.90
							}
						}
						10 = { 
							multiply_variable = { 
								which = ntf
								value = 0.95
							}
						}
						10 = { 
							multiply_variable = { 
								which = ntf
								value = 1.00
							}
						}
						10 = { 
							multiply_variable = { 
								which = ntf
								value = 1.05
							}
						}
						10 = { 
							multiply_variable = { 
								which = ntf
								value = 1.10
							}
						}
						10 = { 
							multiply_variable = { 
								which = ntf
								value = 1.15
							}
						}
						10 = { 
							multiply_variable = { 
								which = ntf
								value = 1.20
							}
						}
						10 = { 
							multiply_variable = { 
								which = ntf
								value = 1.25
							}
						}
					}
					if = { 
						limit = { 
							AND = { 
								is_variable_equal = { 
									which = knl
									value = 1
								}
							}
						}
						change_variable = { 
							which = ntf
							value = 1
						}
					}
					else_if = { 
						limit = { 
							AND = { 
								is_variable_equal = { 
									which = knl
									value = 3
								}
							}
						}
						change_variable = { 
							which = ntf
							value = -1
						}
					}
					if = { 
						limit = { 
							AND = { 
								is_variable_equal = { 
									which = kns
									value = 3
								}
							}
						}
						change_variable = { 
							which = ntf
							value = 1
						}
					}
					else_if = { 
						limit = { 
							AND = { 
								is_variable_equal = { 
									which = kns
									value = 1
								}
							}
						}
						change_variable = { 
							which = ntf
							value = -1
						}
					}
					if = { 
						limit = { 
							AND = { 
								is_variable_equal = { 
									which = knv
									value = 4
								}
							}
						}
						change_variable = { 
							which = ntf
							value = 1
						}
					}
					else_if = { 
						limit = { 
							AND = { 
								is_variable_equal = { 
									which = knv
									value = 3
								}
							}
						}
						change_variable = { 
							which = ntf
							value = -1
						}
					}
					if = { 
						limit = { 
							OR = { 
								has_country_flag = accepted_graft
								OR = { 
									has_country_flag = French_Curia
									has_country_flag = Italian_Curia
									has_country_flag = Iberian_Curia
									has_country_flag = Imperial_Curia
									has_country_flag = English_Curia
								}
							}
						}
						change_variable = { 
							which = ntf
							value = 2
						}
					}
					else_if = { 
						limit = { 
							has_country_flag = refused_graft
						}
						change_variable = { 
							which = ntf
							value = -2
						}
					}
					if = { 
						limit = { 
							has_country_flag = Restricted_Curia
						}
						change_variable = { 
							which = ntf
							value = 1
						}
					}
					else_if = { 
						limit = { 
							has_country_flag = Enlarged_Curia
						}
						change_variable = { 
							which = ntf
							value = 0
						}
					}
					else_if = { 
						limit = { 
							has_country_flag = Extended_Curia
						}
						change_variable = { 
							which = ntf
							value = -1
						}
					}
					else_if = { 
						limit = { 
							has_country_flag = Unrestricted_Curia
						}
						change_variable = { 
							which = ntf
							value = -2
						}
					}
				}
			}
			else_if = { 
				limit = { 
					tag = AVI
				}
				set_global_flag = DG_Live_Pope_in_Avignon
				hidden_effect = { 
					AVI = { 
						set_variable = { 
							which = kdt
							value = 0
						}
						set_variable = { 
							which = kdu
							value = 0
						}
						set_variable = { 
							which = kdv
							value = 0
						}
						set_variable = { 
							which = kdw
							value = 0
						}
						set_variable = { 
							which = kdx
							value = 0
						}
						set_variable = { 
							which = nto
							value = 0
						}
					}
					save_event_target_as = CardinalProv
					every_known_country = { 
						limit = { 
							OR = { 
								religion = catholic
								religion = protestant
								religion = reformed
								religion = hussite
								religion = waldensian
								religion = lollard
								religion = avignonist
								religion = holyleague
							}
						}
						AVI = { 
							change_variable = { 
								which = kdt
								value = 1
							}
						}
						if = { 
							limit = { 
								religion = event_target:CardinalProv
							}
							AVI = { 
								change_variable = { 
									which = kdu
									value = 1
								}
							}
						}
						every_owned_province = { 
							limit = { 
								OR = { 
									religion = catholic
									religion = protestant
									religion = reformed
									religion = hussite

									religion = lollard

								}

									value = 0.1
								}

							if = {

								}

									change_variable = { 
										which = kdw
										value = 0.1
									}
								}
							}
							if = { 
								limit = {

								}

									change_variable = { 
										which = kdx
										value = 0.1
									}
								}
								trigger_switch = { 
									on_trigger = has_province_flag
									MN_Archbishopric = { 
										AVI = { 
											change_variable = { 
												which = kdx
												value = 0.05
											}
										}
									}
									MN_Patriarchate = {

											change_variable = { 
												which = kdx
												value = 0.01
											}
										}
									}
								}
							}
						}
					}
					AVI = { 
						if = { 
							limit = { 
								NOT = { 
									AND = { 
										is_variable_equal = { 
											which = kdt
											value = 0
										}
									}
								}
							}
							divide_variable = { 
								which = kdu
								which = kdt
							}
							multiply_variable = { 
								which = kdu
								value = 200
							}
							set_variable = { 
								which = nto
								which = kdu
							}
						}
						if = { 
							limit = { 
								NOT = { 
									AND = { 
										is_variable_equal = { 
											which = kdv
											value = 0
										}
									}

							}
							divide_variable = {

								which = kdv

							value = 200
						}
						change_variable = { 
							which = nto
							which = kdx
						}
						if = { 
							limit = { 
								NOT = { 
									AND = { 
										is_variable_equal = {

											value = 1
										}
									}
								}

							change_variable = { 
								which = nto

							}

											value = 1
										}
									}
								}
							}
							change_variable = { 
								which = nto
								value = -25
							}
						}
						if = { 
							limit = { 
								is_religion_enabled = waldensian
							}
							change_variable = { 
								which = nto
								value = -25
							}
						}
						if = { 
							limit = { 
								is_religion_enabled = lollard
							}
							change_variable = { 
								which = nto
								value = -25

						if = {

							}

								is_religion_enabled = protestant
							}

							}
						}
						if = { 
							limit = { 
								is_religion_enabled = reformed
							}
							change_variable = { 
								which = nto
								value = -25
							}
						}
						if = { 
							limit = { 
								OR = { 
									has_country_flag = French_Curia
									has_country_flag = Italian_Curia
									has_country_flag = Iberian_Curia
									has_country_flag = Imperial_Curia
									has_country_flag = English_Curia
								}
							}
							multiply_variable = {

								value = 0.50
							}
						}
						else_if = { 
							limit = { 
								NOT = { 
									has_global_flag = DG_Live_Pope_in_Rome
								}
							}
							multiply_variable = { 
								which = nto
								value = 0.50
							}
						}
						else_if = { 
							limit = { 
								has_global_flag = DG_Live_Pope_in_Rome
								is_papal_controller = yes
							}
							change_variable = { 
								which = nto
								value = 100
							}
						}
						if = { 
							limit = { 
								has_country_flag = Pious_Pope
							}
							multiply_variable = { 
								which = nto
								value = 1.10
							}
						}
						else_if = { 
							limit = { 
								has_country_flag = Corrupt_Pope
							}
							multiply_variable = { 
								which = nto
								value = 0.90
							}
						}
						if = { 
							limit = { 
								NOT = { 
									AND = { 
										check_variable = { 
											which = nto
											value = 1
										}
									}
								}
							}
							set_variable = { 
								which = nto
								value = 1
							}
						}
						set_variable = { 
							which = kdt
							value = 0
						}
						set_variable = { 
							which = kdu
							value = 0
						}
						set_variable = { 
							which = kdv
							value = 0
						}
						set_variable = { 
							which = kdw
							value = 0
						}
						set_variable = { 
							which = kdx
							value = 0
						}
					}
					export_to_variable = { 
						which = export
						value = corruption
					}
					set_variable = { 
						which = ntf
						which = export
					}
					multiply_variable = { 
						which = ntf
						value = 0.10
					}
					random_list = { 
						10 = { 
							multiply_variable = { 
								which = ntf
								value = 0.75
							}
						}
						10 = { 
							multiply_variable = { 
								which = ntf
								value = 0.80
							}
						}
						10 = { 
							multiply_variable = {

								value = 0.85
							}
						}
						10 = { 
							multiply_variable = { 
								which = ntf
								value = 0.90
							}
						}
						10 = { 
							multiply_variable = { 
								which = ntf
								value = 0.95
							}
						}
						10 = { 
							multiply_variable = { 
								which = ntf
								value = 1.00
							}
						}
						10 = { 
							multiply_variable = { 
								which = ntf
								value = 1.05
							}
						}
						10 = { 
							multiply_variable = {

								value = 1.10
							}
						}
						10 = { 
							multiply_variable = { 
								which = ntf
								value = 1.15
							}
						}
						10 = { 
							multiply_variable = { 
								which = ntf
								value = 1.20
							}
						}
						10 = { 
							multiply_variable = { 
								which = ntf
								value = 1.25
							}
						}
					}
					if = { 
						limit = { 
							AND = { 
								is_variable_equal = { 
									which = knl
									value = 1
								}
							}
						}
						change_variable = { 
							which = ntf
							value = 1
						}
					}
					else_if = { 
						limit = { 
							AND = { 
								is_variable_equal = { 
									which = knl
									value = 3
								}
							}
						}
						change_variable = { 
							which = ntf
							value = -1
						}
					}
					if = { 
						limit = { 
							AND = { 
								is_variable_equal = { 
									which = kns
									value = 3
								}
							}
						}
						change_variable = {

							value = 1

						limit = { 
							AND = {

									which = kns
									value = 1
								}
							}
						}

									value = 4

							which = ntf

									value = 3
								}
							}
						}

								OR = {

							value = 2
						}

					else_if = { 
						limit = { 
							has_country_flag = refused_graft
						}
						change_variable = { 
							which = ntf
							value = -2
						}
					}
					if = { 
						limit = { 
							has_country_flag = Restricted_Curia
						}
						change_variable = { 
							which = ntf
							value = 1
						}

							has_country_flag = Enlarged_Curia

							which = ntf
							value = -1
						}
					}
					else_if = { 
						limit = { 
							has_country_flag = Unrestricted_Curia
						}
						change_variable = { 
							which = ntf
							value = -2
						}
					}
				}
			}
			log = "DG - Getting new pope - pious"
		}
	}
	option = { 
		name = "OPT.DULYNOTED2"
		every_country = { 
			limit = { 
				ai = no
				religion = ROOT
				has_country_flag = papacy_notification
			}
			country_event = { 
				id = DG_Papacy.108
				days = 2
			}
		}
		add_reform_desire = -0.0001
	}
	after = { 
		FROM = { 
			country_event = { 
				id = DG_Papacy.109
				days = 10
			}
		}
	}
}

	id = DG_Papacy.108
	title = "DG_Papacy.107.title"
	desc = { 
		trigger = { 
			religion = catholic

		desc = DG_Papacy.107.desca

		trigger = { 
			religion = avignonist
		}
		desc = DG_Papacy.107.descb

		name = "OPT.DULYNOTED2"
	}
}
country_event = { 
	id = DG_Papacy.109
	title = "AI_Event"
	desc = "AI_Event"
	picture = catholic_college_of_cardinals
	hidden = yes
	is_triggered_only = yes
	option = { 
		name = "AI_Event"
		clr_country_flag = Conclave_Underway
		clear_global_event_target = preferiti_1
		clear_global_event_target = preferiti_2
		clear_global_event_target = preferiti_3
		clear_global_event_target = preferiti_4
		set_variable = { 
			which = puv
			value = 0
		}
		set_variable = { 
			which = puw
			value = 0
		}
		set_variable = { 
			which = pux
			value = 0
		}
		set_variable = { 
			which = puy
			value = 0
		}
		set_variable = { 
			which = pvb
			value = 0
		}
		set_variable = { 
			which = pva
			value = 0
		}
		every_country = { 
			limit = { 
				religion = ROOT
			}
			clr_country_flag = buy_pope_1
			clr_country_flag = vote_pope_1
			clr_country_flag = buy_pope_2
			clr_country_flag = vote_pope_2
			clr_country_flag = buy_pope_3
			clr_country_flag = vote_pope_3
			clr_country_flag = buy_pope_4
			clr_country_flag = vote_pope_4
		}
	}
}
country_event = { 
	id = DG_Papacy.110
	title = "AI_Event"
	desc = "AI_Event"
	picture = catholic_college_of_cardinals
	hidden = yes
	is_triggered_only = yes
	option = { 
		name = "AI_Event"
		trigger = { 
			PAP = { 
				has_country_flag = preferiti_1_secular
			}
		}
		if = { 
			limit = { 
				any_country = { 
					has_country_flag = vote_pope_1
					num_of_cardinals = 8
				}
			}
			random_country = { 
				limit = { 
					has_country_flag = vote_pope_1
					num_of_cardinals = 8
				}
				country_event = { 
					id = DG_Papacy.111
					days = 5
				}
			}
		}
		else_if = { 
			limit = { 
				any_country = { 
					has_country_flag = vote_pope_1
					num_of_cardinals = 6
				}
			}
			random_country = { 
				limit = { 
					has_country_flag = vote_pope_1
					num_of_cardinals = 6
				}
				country_event = { 
					id = DG_Papacy.111
					days = 5
				}
			}
		}
		else_if = { 
			limit = { 
				any_country = { 
					has_country_flag = vote_pope_1
					num_of_cardinals = 4
				}
			}
			random_country = { 
				limit = { 
					has_country_flag = vote_pope_1
					num_of_cardinals = 4
				}
				country_event = { 
					id = DG_Papacy.111
					days = 5
				}
			}
		}
		else_if = { 
			limit = { 
				any_country = { 
					has_country_flag = vote_pope_1
					num_of_cardinals = 2
				}
			}
			random_country = { 
				limit = { 
					has_country_flag = vote_pope_1
					num_of_cardinals = 2
				}
				country_event = { 
					id = DG_Papacy.111
					days = 5
				}
			}
		}
		else = { 
			PAP = { 
				country_event = { 
					id = DG_Papacy.112
					days = 5
				}
			}
		}
	}
	option = { 
		name = "AI_Event"
		trigger = { 
			PAP = { 
				has_country_flag = preferiti_2_secular
			}
		}
		if = { 
			limit = { 
				any_country = { 
					has_country_flag = vote_pope_2
					num_of_cardinals = 8
				}
			}
			random_country = { 
				limit = { 
					has_country_flag = vote_pope_2
					num_of_cardinals = 8
				}
				country_event = { 
					id = DG_Papacy.111
					days = 5
				}
			}
		}
		else_if = { 
			limit = { 
				any_country = { 
					has_country_flag = vote_pope_2
					num_of_cardinals = 6
				}
			}
			random_country = { 
				limit = { 
					has_country_flag = vote_pope_2
					num_of_cardinals = 6
				}
				country_event = { 
					id = DG_Papacy.111
					days = 5
				}
			}
		}
		else_if = { 
			limit = { 
				any_country = { 
					has_country_flag = vote_pope_2
					num_of_cardinals = 4
				}
			}
			random_country = { 
				limit = { 
					has_country_flag = vote_pope_2
					num_of_cardinals = 4
				}
				country_event = { 
					id = DG_Papacy.111
					days = 5
				}
			}
		}
		else_if = { 
			limit = { 
				any_country = { 
					has_country_flag = vote_pope_2
					num_of_cardinals = 2
				}
			}
			random_country = { 
				limit = { 
					has_country_flag = vote_pope_2
					num_of_cardinals = 2
				}
				country_event = { 
					id = DG_Papacy.111
					days = 5
				}
			}
		}
		else = { 
			PAP = { 
				country_event = { 
					id = DG_Papacy.112
					days = 5
				}
			}
		}
	}
	option = { 
		name = "AI_Event"
		trigger = { 
			PAP = { 
				has_country_flag = preferiti_3_secular
			}
		}
		if = { 
			limit = { 
				any_country = { 
					has_country_flag = vote_pope_3
					num_of_cardinals = 8
				}
			}
			random_country = { 
				limit = { 
					has_country_flag = vote_pope_3
					num_of_cardinals = 8
				}
				country_event = { 
					id = DG_Papacy.111
					days = 5
				}
			}
		}
		else_if = { 
			limit = { 
				any_country = { 
					has_country_flag = vote_pope_3
					num_of_cardinals = 6
				}
			}
			random_country = { 
				limit = { 
					has_country_flag = vote_pope_3
					num_of_cardinals = 6
				}
				country_event = { 
					id = DG_Papacy.111
					days = 5
				}
			}
		}
		else_if = { 
			limit = { 
				any_country = { 
					has_country_flag = vote_pope_3
					num_of_cardinals = 4
				}
			}
			random_country = {

					has_country_flag = vote_pope_3
					num_of_cardinals = 4
				}
				country_event = { 
					id = DG_Papacy.111
					days = 5
				}
			}
		}
		else_if = { 
			limit = { 
				any_country = { 
					has_country_flag = vote_pope_3
					num_of_cardinals = 2
				}
			}
			random_country = { 
				limit = { 
					has_country_flag = vote_pope_3
					num_of_cardinals = 2
				}
				country_event = { 
					id = DG_Papacy.111
					days = 5
				}
			}
		}
		else = { 
			PAP = { 
				country_event = { 
					id = DG_Papacy.112
					days = 5
				}
			}
		}
	}
	option = { 
		name = "AI_Event"
		trigger = { 
			PAP = { 
				has_country_flag = preferiti_4_secular
			}
		}
		if = {

				any_country = { 
					has_country_flag = vote_pope_4
					num_of_cardinals = 8

			}

					days = 5

			}
		}
		else = { 
			PAP = { 
				country_event = { 
					id = DG_Papacy.112
					days = 5
				}
			}
		}
	}

		name = "AI_Event"
		trigger = { 
			AVI = { 
				has_country_flag = preferiti_1_secular
			}

		if = { 
			limit = { 
				any_country = {

					num_of_cardinals = 8
