				clr_country_flag = Italian_Curia
				clr_country_flag = Iberian_Curia
				clr_country_flag = Imperial_Curia
				clr_country_flag = English_Curia
				set_global_flag = DG_Babylonian_Captivity_Ends
				set_ruler_flag = Captivity_Ending_Pope
				set_country_flag = Divided_Conclave
				restore_country_name = yes
			}
		}
		hidden_effect = { 
			every_known_country = { 
				limit = { 
					religion = ROOT
					num_of_cardinals = 1
					is_excommunicated = no
				}
				country_event = { 
					id = DG_Papacy.103
					days = 15
					random = 3
				}
			}
			country_event = { 
				id = DG_Papacy.106
				days = 150
			}
		}
	}
}
country_event = { 
	id = DG_Papacy.200
	title = "DG_Papacy.201.title"
	desc = "DG_Papacy.201.desc"
	picture = hindu_mob
	trigger = { 
		tag = PAP
	}
	hidden = yes
	fire_only_once = yes
	option = { 
		if = { 
			limit = { 
				is_subject = no
			}
			country_event = { 
				id = DG_Papacy.201
			}
		}
		else = { 
			overlord = { 
				country_event = { 
					id = DG_Papacy.203
				}
			}
		}
	}
}
country_event = { 
	id = DG_Papacy.201
	title = "DG_Papacy.201.title"
	desc = "DG_Papacy.201.desc"
	picture = hindu_mob
	fire_only_once = yes
	trigger = { 
		tag = PAP
		is_subject = no
		capital_scope = { 
			province_id = 2530
		}
		owns = 202
		OR = { 
			has_global_flag = DG_Babylonian_Captivity_Ends
			has_country_flag = Conclave_Underway
			capital_scope = { 
				controlled_by = REB
			}
		}
		NOT = { 
			has_ruler_flag = Divided_Conclave_Pope
		}
		has_country_flag = Divided_Conclave
	}
	mean_time_to_happen = { 
		months = 2
	}
	immediate = { 
		log = "DG:[GetYear]: Election of the Roman Pope"
		add_reform_desire = 0.0005
		set_global_flag = DG_Western_Schism_Start
	}
	option = { 
		name = "DG_Papacy.201.opta"
		ai_chance = { 
			factor = 99
			modifier = { 
				NOT = { 
					capital_scope = { 
						controlled_by = ROOT
					}
				}
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = { 
				is_at_war = yes
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = { 
				NOT = { 
					prestige = 0
				}
				factor = 0.7
			}
		}
		add_prestige = -5
		hidden_effect = { 
			every_country = { 
				limit = { 
					papal_influence = 1
				}
				add_papal_influence = -400
			}
			every_known_country = { 
				limit = { 
					religion = catholic
					NOT = { 
						tag = PAP
					}
					has_country_flag = papacy_notification
				}
				country_event = { 
					id = DG_Papacy.202
				}
			}
		}
		define_ruler = { 
			min_age = 58
		}
		set_ruler_culture = umbrian
		clr_country_flag = Conclave_Underway
		clr_country_flag = Deadlocked_Conclave
		set_country_flag = Corrupt_Pope
		set_global_flag = DG_Live_Pope_in_Rome
		hidden_effect = { 
			PAP = { 
				set_variable = { 
					which = kdt
					value = 0
				}
				set_variable = { 
					which = kdu
					value = 0
				}
				set_variable = { 
					which = kdv
					value = 0
				}
				set_variable = { 
					which = kdw
					value = 0
				}
				set_variable = { 
					which = kdx
					value = 0
				}
				set_variable = { 
					which = nto
					value = 0
				}
			}
			save_event_target_as = CardinalProv
			every_known_country = { 
				limit = { 
					OR = { 
						religion = catholic
						religion = protestant
						religion = reformed
						religion = hussite
						religion = waldensian
						religion = lollard
						religion = avignonist
						religion = holyleague
					}
				}
				PAP = { 
					change_variable = { 
						which = kdt
						value = 1
					}
				}
				if = { 
					limit = { 
						religion = event_target:CardinalProv
					}
					PAP = { 
						change_variable = { 
							which = kdu
							value = 1
						}
					}
				}
				every_owned_province = { 
					limit = { 
						OR = { 
							religion = catholic
							religion = protestant
							religion = reformed
							religion = hussite
							religion = waldensian
							religion = lollard
							religion = avignonist
							religion = holyleague
						}
					}
					PAP = { 
						change_variable = { 
							which = kdv
							value = 0.1
						}
					}
					if = { 
						limit = { 
							owned_by = PAP
						}
						PAP = { 
							change_variable = { 
								which = kdw
								value = 0.1
							}
						}
					}
					if = { 
						limit = { 
							religion = event_target:CardinalProv
						}
						PAP = { 
							change_variable = { 
								which = kdx
								value = 0.1
							}
						}
						trigger_switch = { 
							on_trigger = has_province_flag
							MN_Archbishopric = { 
								PAP = { 
									change_variable = { 
										which = kdx
										value = 0.05
									}
								}
							}
							MN_Patriarchate = { 
								PAP = { 
									change_variable = { 
										which = kdx
										value = 0.01
									}
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
			PAP = { 
				if = { 
					limit = { 
						NOT = { 
							AND = { 
								is_variable_equal = { 
									which = kdt
									value = 0
								}
							}
						}
					}
					divide_variable = { 
						which = kdu
						which = kdt
					}
					multiply_variable = { 
						which = kdu
						value = 200
					}
					set_variable = { 
						which = nto
						which = kdu
					}
				}
				if = { 
					limit = { 
						NOT = { 
							AND = { 
								is_variable_equal = { 
									which = kdv
									value = 0
								}
							}
						}
					}
					divide_variable = { 
						which = kdx
						which = kdv
					}
				}
				multiply_variable = { 
					which = kdx
					value = 200
				}
				change_variable = { 
					which = nto
					which = kdx
				}
				if = { 
					limit = { 
						NOT = { 
							AND = { 
								is_variable_equal = { 
									which = kni
									value = 1
								}
							}
						}
					}
					change_variable = { 
						which = nto
						value = -25
					}
				}
				if = { 
					limit = { 
						NOT = { 
							AND = { 
								is_variable_equal = { 
									which = knj
									value = 1
								}
							}
						}
					}
					change_variable = { 
						which = nto
						value = -25
					}
				}
				if = { 
					limit = { 
						NOT = { 
							AND = { 
								is_variable_equal = { 
									which = knr
									value = 1
								}
							}
						}
					}
					change_variable = { 
						which = nto
						value = -25
					}
				}
				if = { 
					limit = { 
						NOT = { 
							AND = { 
								is_variable_equal = { 
									which = knw
									value = 1
								}
							}
						}
					}
					change_variable = { 
						which = nto
						value = -25
					}
				}
				if = { 
					limit = { 
						is_religion_enabled = waldensian
					}
					change_variable = { 
						which = nto
						value = -25
					}
				}
				if = { 
					limit = { 
						is_religion_enabled = lollard
					}
					change_variable = { 
						which = nto
						value = -25
					}
				}
				if = { 
					limit = { 
						is_religion_enabled = hussite
					}
					change_variable = { 
						which = nto
						value = -25
					}
				}
				if = { 
					limit = { 
						is_religion_enabled = protestant
					}
					change_variable = { 
						which = nto
						value = -25
					}
				}
				if = { 
					limit = { 
						is_religion_enabled = reformed
					}
					change_variable = { 
						which = nto
						value = -25
					}
				}
				if = { 
					limit = { 
						OR = { 
							has_country_flag = French_Curia
							has_country_flag = Italian_Curia
							has_country_flag = Iberian_Curia
							has_country_flag = Imperial_Curia
							has_country_flag = English_Curia
						}
					}
					multiply_variable = { 
						which = nto
						value = 0.50
					}
				}
				else_if = { 
					limit = { 
						NOT = { 
							has_global_flag = DG_Live_Pope_in_Rome
						}
					}
					multiply_variable = { 
						which = nto
						value = 0.50
					}
				}
				else_if = { 
					limit = { 
						has_global_flag = DG_Live_Pope_in_Rome
						is_papal_controller = yes
					}
					change_variable = { 
						which = nto
						value = 100
					}
				}
				if = { 
					limit = { 
						has_country_flag = Pious_Pope
					}
					multiply_variable = { 
						which = nto
						value = 1.10
					}
				}
				else_if = { 
					limit = { 
						has_country_flag = Corrupt_Pope
					}
					multiply_variable = { 
						which = nto
						value = 0.90
					}
				}
				if = { 
					limit = { 
						NOT = { 
							AND = { 
								check_variable = { 
									which = nto
									value = 1
								}
							}
						}
					}
					set_variable = { 
						which = nto
						value = 1
					}
				}
				set_variable = { 
					which = kdt
					value = 0
				}
				set_variable = { 
					which = kdu
					value = 0
				}
				set_variable = { 
					which = kdv
					value = 0
				}
				set_variable = { 
					which = kdw
					value = 0
				}
				set_variable = { 
					which = kdx
					value = 0
				}
			}
			export_to_variable = { 
				which = export
				value = corruption
			}
			set_variable = { 
				which = ntf
				which = export
			}
			multiply_variable = { 
				which = ntf
				value = 0.10
			}
			random_list = { 
				10 = { 
					multiply_variable = { 
						which = ntf
						value = 0.75
					}
				}
				10 = { 
					multiply_variable = { 
						which = ntf
						value = 0.80
					}
				}
				10 = { 
					multiply_variable = { 
						which = ntf
						value = 0.85
					}
				}
				10 = { 
					multiply_variable = { 
						which = ntf
						value = 0.90
					}
				}
				10 = { 
					multiply_variable = { 
						which = ntf
						value = 0.95
					}
				}
				10 = { 
					multiply_variable = { 
						which = ntf
						value = 1.00
					}
				}
				10 = { 
					multiply_variable = { 
						which = ntf
						value = 1.05
					}
				}
				10 = { 
					multiply_variable = { 
						which = ntf
						value = 1.10
					}
				}
				10 = { 
					multiply_variable = { 
						which = ntf
						value = 1.15
					}
				}
				10 = { 
					multiply_variable = { 
						which = ntf
						value = 1.20
					}
				}
				10 = { 
					multiply_variable = { 
						which = ntf
						value = 1.25
					}
				}
			}
			if = { 
				limit = { 
					AND = { 
						is_variable_equal = { 
							which = knl
							value = 1
						}
					}
				}
				change_variable = { 
					which = ntf
					value = 1
				}
			}
			else_if = { 
				limit = { 
					AND = { 
						is_variable_equal = { 
							which = knl
							value = 3
						}
					}
				}
				change_variable = { 
					which = ntf
					value = -1
				}
			}
			if = { 
				limit = { 
					AND = { 
						is_variable_equal = { 
							which = kns
							value = 3
						}
					}
				}
				change_variable = { 
					which = ntf
					value = 1
				}
			}
			else_if = { 
				limit = { 
					AND = { 
						is_variable_equal = { 
							which = kns
							value = 1
						}
					}
				}
				change_variable = { 
					which = ntf
					value = -1
				}
			}
			if = { 
				limit = { 
					AND = { 
						is_variable_equal = { 
							which = knv
							value = 4
						}
					}
				}
				change_variable = { 
					which = ntf
					value = 1
				}
			}
			else_if = { 
				limit = { 
					AND = { 
						is_variable_equal = { 
							which = knv
							value = 3
						}
					}
				}
				change_variable = { 
					which = ntf
					value = -1
				}
			}
			if = { 
				limit = { 
					OR = { 
						has_country_flag = accepted_graft
						OR = { 
							has_country_flag = French_Curia
							has_country_flag = Italian_Curia
							has_country_flag = Iberian_Curia
							has_country_flag = Imperial_Curia
							has_country_flag = English_Curia
						}
					}
				}
				change_variable = { 
					which = ntf
					value = 2
				}
			}
			else_if = { 
				limit = { 
					has_country_flag = refused_graft
				}
				change_variable = { 
					which = ntf
					value = -2
				}
			}
			if = { 
				limit = { 
					has_country_flag = Restricted_Curia
				}
				change_variable = { 
					which = ntf
					value = 1
				}
			}
			else_if = { 
				limit = { 
					has_country_flag = Enlarged_Curia
				}
				change_variable = { 
					which = ntf
					value = 0
				}
			}
			else_if = { 
				limit = { 
					has_country_flag = Extended_Curia
				}
				change_variable = { 
					which = ntf
					value = -1
				}
			}
			else_if = { 
				limit = { 
					has_country_flag = Unrestricted_Curia
				}
				change_variable = { 
					which = ntf
					value = -2
				}
			}
		}
		hidden_effect = { 
			set_global_flag = DG_Rigged_Conclave
			every_known_country = { 
				limit = { 
					ai = no
				}
				country_event = { 
					id = DG_Papacy.202
				}
			}
			PAP = { 
				country_event = { 
					id = DG_Papacy.205
					days = 180
					random = 30
				}
			}
		}
	}
	option = { 
		name = "DG_Papacy.201.optb"
		ai_chance = { 
			factor = 1
		}
		capital_scope = { 
			add_province_modifier = { 
				name = "fanatics_organizing"
				duration = 1825
			}
			add_unrest = 5
		}
		hidden_effect = { 
			every_known_country = { 
				limit = { 
					religion = ROOT
					num_of_cardinals = 1
					is_excommunicated = no
				}
				country_event = { 
					id = DG_Papacy.103
					days = 15
					random = 3
				}
			}
			country_event = { 
				id = DG_Papacy.106
				days = 150
			}
			clr_global_flag = DG_Western_Schism_Start
			set_global_flag = DG_Regular_Conclave
			every_known_country = { 
				limit = { 
					ai = no
				}
				country_event = { 
					id = DG_Papacy.202
				}
			}
			PAP = { 
				country_event = { 
					id = DG_Papacy.205
					days = 180
					random = 30
				}
			}
		}
	}
}
country_event = { 
	id = DG_Papacy.202
	title = "DG_Papacy.201.title"
	desc = "DG_Papacy.201.desc"
	picture = hindu_mob
	is_triggered_only = yes
	immediate = { 
		if = { 
			limit = { 
				has_global_flag = DG_Rigged_Conclave
			}
			custom_tooltip = DG_Rigged_Conclave_tt
		}
		else_if = { 
			limit = { 
				has_global_flag = DG_Regular_Conclave
			}
			custom_tooltip = DG_Regular_Conclave_tt
		}
	}
	option = { 
		name = "OPT.DULYNOTED2"
		hidden_effect = { 
			clr_global_flag = DG_Rigged_Conclave
			clr_global_flag = DG_Regular_Conclave
		}
	}
}
country_event = { 
	id = DG_Papacy.203
	title = "DG_Papacy.203.title"
	desc = "DG_Papacy.203.desc"
	picture = hindu_mob
	fire_only_once = yes
	trigger = { 
		overlord_of = PAP
		owns_or_non_sovereign_subject_of = 202
		PAP = { 
			capital_scope = { 
				province_id = 2530
			}
			OR = { 
				has_global_flag = DG_Babylonian_Captivity_Ends
				has_country_flag = Conclave_Underway
				capital_scope = { 
					controlled_by = REB
				}
			}
			NOT = { 
				has_ruler_flag = Divided_Conclave_Pope
			}
			has_country_flag = Divided_Conclave
		}
	}
	mean_time_to_happen = { 
		months = 2
	}
	immediate = { 
		log = "DG:[GetYear]: Election of the Roman Pope"
		add_reform_desire = 0.0005
		set_global_flag = DG_Western_Schism_Start
	}
	option = { 
		name = "DG_Papacy.203.opta"
		ai_chance = { 
			factor = 99
			modifier = { 
				is_at_war = yes
				factor = 1.4
			}
			modifier = { 
				NOT = { 
					prestige = 0
				}
				factor = 0.7
			}
		}
		hidden_effect = { 
			every_country = { 
				limit = { 
					papal_influence = 1
				}
				add_papal_influence = -400
			}
			every_known_country = { 
				limit = { 
					religion = catholic
					NOT = { 
						tag = PAP
					}
					has_country_flag = papacy_notification
				}
				country_event = { 
					id = DG_Papacy.202
				}
			}
		}
		PAP = { 
			define_ruler = { }
			set_ruler_culture = umbrian
			clr_country_flag = Conclave_Underway
			clr_country_flag = Deadlocked_Conclave
			set_country_flag = Corrupt_Pope
			set_global_flag = DG_Live_Pope_in_Rome
			hidden_effect = { 
				PAP = { 
					set_variable = { 
						which = kdt
						value = 0
					}
					set_variable = { 
						which = kdu
						value = 0
					}
					set_variable = { 
						which = kdv
						value = 0
					}
					set_variable = { 
						which = kdw
						value = 0
					}
					set_variable = { 
						which = kdx
						value = 0
					}
					set_variable = { 
						which = nto
						value = 0
					}
				}
				save_event_target_as = CardinalProv
				every_known_country = { 
					limit = { 
						OR = { 
							religion = catholic
							religion = protestant
							religion = reformed
							religion = hussite
							religion = waldensian
							religion = lollard
							religion = avignonist
							religion = holyleague
						}
					}
					PAP = { 
						change_variable = { 
							which = kdt
							value = 1
						}
					}
					if = { 
						limit = { 
							religion = event_target:CardinalProv
						}
						PAP = { 
							change_variable = { 
								which = kdu
								value = 1
							}
						}
					}
					every_owned_province = { 
						limit = { 
							OR = { 
								religion = catholic
								religion = protestant
								religion = reformed
								religion = hussite
								religion = waldensian
								religion = lollard
								religion = avignonist
								religion = holyleague
							}
						}
						PAP = { 
							change_variable = { 
								which = kdv
								value = 0.1
							}
						}
						if = { 
							limit = { 
								owned_by = PAP
							}
							PAP = { 
								change_variable = { 
									which = kdw
									value = 0.1
								}
							}
						}
						if = { 
							limit = { 
								religion = event_target:CardinalProv
							}
							PAP = { 
								change_variable = { 
									which = kdx
									value = 0.1
								}
							}
							trigger_switch = { 
								on_trigger = has_province_flag
								MN_Archbishopric = { 
									PAP = { 
										change_variable = { 
											which = kdx
											value = 0.05
										}
									}
								}
								MN_Patriarchate = { 
									PAP = { 
										change_variable = { 
											which = kdx
											value = 0.01
										}
									}
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
				PAP = { 
					if = { 
						limit = { 
							NOT = { 
								AND = { 
									is_variable_equal = { 
										which = kdt
										value = 0
									}
								}
							}
						}
						divide_variable = { 
							which = kdu
							which = kdt
						}
						multiply_variable = { 
							which = kdu
							value = 200
						}
						set_variable = { 
							which = nto
							which = kdu
						}
					}
					if = { 
						limit = { 
							NOT = { 
								AND = { 
									is_variable_equal = { 
										which = kdv
										value = 0
									}
								}
							}
						}
						divide_variable = { 
							which = kdx
							which = kdv
						}
					}
					multiply_variable = { 
						which = kdx
						value = 200
					}
					change_variable = { 
						which = nto
						which = kdx
					}
					if = { 
						limit = { 
							NOT = { 
								AND = { 
									is_variable_equal = { 
										which = kni
										value = 1
									}
								}
							}
						}
						change_variable = { 
							which = nto
							value = -25
						}
					}
					if = { 
						limit = { 
							NOT = { 
								AND = { 
									is_variable_equal = { 
										which = knj
										value = 1
									}
								}
							}
						}
						change_variable = { 
							which = nto
							value = -25
						}
					}
					if = { 
						limit = { 
							NOT = { 
								AND = { 
									is_variable_equal = { 
										which = knr
										value = 1
									}
								}
							}
						}
						change_variable = { 
							which = nto
							value = -25
						}
					}
					if = { 
						limit = { 
							NOT = { 
								AND = { 
									is_variable_equal = { 
										which = knw
										value = 1
									}
								}
							}
						}
						change_variable = { 
							which = nto
							value = -25
						}
					}
					if = { 
						limit = { 
							is_religion_enabled = waldensian
						}
						change_variable = { 
							which = nto
							value = -25
						}
					}
					if = { 
						limit = { 
							is_religion_enabled = lollard
						}
						change_variable = { 
							which = nto
							value = -25
						}
					}
					if = { 
						limit = { 
							is_religion_enabled = hussite
						}
						change_variable = { 
							which = nto
							value = -25
						}
					}
					if = { 
						limit = { 
							is_religion_enabled = protestant
						}
						change_variable = { 
							which = nto
							value = -25
						}
					}
					if = { 
						limit = { 
							is_religion_enabled = reformed
						}
						change_variable = { 
							which = nto
							value = -25
						}
					}
					if = { 
						limit = { 
							OR = { 
								has_country_flag = French_Curia
								has_country_flag = Italian_Curia
								has_country_flag = Iberian_Curia
								has_country_flag = Imperial_Curia
								has_country_flag = English_Curia
							}
						}
						multiply_variable = { 
							which = nto
							value = 0.50
						}
					}
					else_if = { 
						limit = { 
							NOT = { 
								has_global_flag = DG_Live_Pope_in_Rome
							}
						}
						multiply_variable = { 
							which = nto
							value = 0.50
						}
					}
					else_if = { 
						limit = { 
							has_global_flag = DG_Live_Pope_in_Rome
							is_papal_controller = yes
						}
						change_variable = { 
							which = nto
							value = 100
						}
					}
					if = { 
						limit = { 
							has_country_flag = Pious_Pope
						}
						multiply_variable = { 
							which = nto
							value = 1.10
						}
					}
					else_if = { 
						limit = { 
							has_country_flag = Corrupt_Pope
						}
						multiply_variable = { 
							which = nto
							value = 0.90
						}
					}
					if = { 
						limit = { 
							NOT = { 
								AND = { 
									check_variable = { 
										which = nto
										value = 1
									}
								}
							}
						}
						set_variable = { 
							which = nto
							value = 1
						}
					}
					set_variable = { 
						which = kdt
						value = 0
					}
					set_variable = { 
						which = kdu
						value = 0
					}
					set_variable = { 
						which = kdv
						value = 0
					}
					set_variable = { 
						which = kdw
						value = 0
					}
					set_variable = { 
						which = kdx
						value = 0
					}
				}
				export_to_variable = { 
					which = export
					value = corruption
				}
				set_variable = { 
					which = ntf
					which = export
				}
				multiply_variable = { 
					which = ntf
					value = 0.10
				}
				random_list = { 
					10 = { 
						multiply_variable = { 
							which = ntf
							value = 0.75
						}
					}
					10 = { 
						multiply_variable = { 
							which = ntf
							value = 0.80
						}

					}

						}
					}
					10 = { 
						multiply_variable = { 
							which = ntf
							value = 1.00
						}
					}
					10 = { 
						multiply_variable = { 
							which = ntf
							value = 1.05
						}
					}
					10 = { 
						multiply_variable = { 
							which = ntf
							value = 1.10
						}
					}
					10 = { 
						multiply_variable = { 
							which = ntf
							value = 1.15
						}
					}
					10 = { 
						multiply_variable = { 
							which = ntf
							value = 1.20
						}
					}
					10 = { 
						multiply_variable = { 
							which = ntf
							value = 1.25
						}
					}
				}
				if = { 
					limit = { 
						AND = { 
							is_variable_equal = { 
								which = knl
								value = 1
							}
						}
					}
					change_variable = { 
						which = ntf
						value = 1
					}
				}
				else_if = { 
					limit = { 
						AND = { 
							is_variable_equal = { 
								which = knl
								value = 3
							}
						}
					}
					change_variable = { 
						which = ntf
						value = -1
					}
				}
				if = { 
					limit = { 
						AND = { 
							is_variable_equal = { 
								which = kns
								value = 3
							}
						}
					}
					change_variable = { 
						which = ntf
						value = 1
					}
				}
				else_if = { 
					limit = { 
						AND = { 
							is_variable_equal = { 
								which = kns
								value = 1
							}
						}
					}
					change_variable = {

						value = -1
					}

								value = 4

						}
					}
					change_variable = {

						value = 1
					}

				else_if = { 
					limit = { 
						AND = { 
							is_variable_equal = { 
								which = knv
								value = 3
							}
						}
					}
					change_variable = { 
						which = ntf
						value = -1
					}
				}

					limit = { 
						OR = { 
							has_country_flag = accepted_graft
							OR = { 
								has_country_flag = French_Curia
								has_country_flag = Italian_Curia
								has_country_flag = Iberian_Curia
								has_country_flag = Imperial_Curia
								has_country_flag = English_Curia

						}

						value = 2
					}

					limit = { 
						has_country_flag = refused_graft

						which = ntf
						value = -2
					}
				}

					limit = { 
						has_country_flag = Restricted_Curia
					}
					change_variable = { 
						which = ntf
						value = 1
					}
				}
				else_if = { 
					limit = { 
						has_country_flag = Enlarged_Curia
					}
					change_variable = { 
						which = ntf
						value = 0
					}
				}

					limit = { 
						has_country_flag = Extended_Curia
					}
					change_variable = { 
						which = ntf
						value = -1
					}
				}
				else_if = { 
					limit = { 
						has_country_flag = Unrestricted_Curia
					}
					change_variable = { 
						which = ntf
						value = -2
					}
				}
				set_global_flag = DG_Rigged_Conclave
				every_known_country = { 
					limit = { 
						ai = no
					}
					country_event = { 
						id = DG_Papacy.202
					}
				}
			}
		}
		if = { 
			limit = { 
				tag = FRA
			}
			PAP = { 
				country_event = { 
					id = DG_Papacy.206
					days = 180
					random = 30
				}
			}
		}
		else = { 
			PAP = { 
				country_event = { 
					id = DG_Papacy.205
					days = 180
					random = 30
				}
			}
		}
	}
	option = { 
		name = "DG_Papacy.203.optb"
		ai_chance = { 
			factor = 1
		}
		add_prestige = -15
		hidden_effect = { 
			every_known_country = { 
				limit = { 
					religion = ROOT
					num_of_cardinals = 1
					is_excommunicated = no
				}
				country_event = { 
					id = DG_Papacy.103
					days = 15
					random = 3
				}
			}
			PAP = { 
				country_event = { 
					id = DG_Papacy.106
					days = 150
				}
				set_global_flag = DG_Regular_Conclave
			}
			if = { 
				limit = { 
					tag = FRA
				}
				country_event = { 
					id = DG_Papacy.206
					days = 180
					random = 30
				}
			}
			else = { 
				country_event = { 
					id = DG_Papacy.205
					days = 180
					random = 30
				}
			}
			hidden_effect = { 
				every_known_country = { 
					limit = { 
						ai = no
					}
					country_event = { 
						id = DG_Papacy.202
					}
				}
				clr_global_flag = DG_Western_Schism_Start
			}
		}
	}
}

	after = { 
		if = { 
			limit = { 
				exists = FRA
			}
			FRA = { 
				country_event = { 
					id = DG_Papacy.207
					days = 15
				}
			}
		}
		else_if = { 
			limit = { 
				exists = KNP
			}
			KNP = { 
				country_event = { 
					id = DG_Papacy.207
					days = 15
				}
			}
		}
		else_if = { 
			limit = { 
				exists = NAP
			}
			NAP = { 
				country_event = { 
					id = DG_Papacy.207
					days = 15
				}
			}
		}
		else_if = { 
			limit = { 
				exists = ENG
				ENG = { 
					religion = catholic
				}
			}
			ENG = { 
				country_event = { 
					id = DG_Papacy.207
					days = 15
				}
			}
		}
		else = { 
			random_country = { 
				limit = { 
					religion = catholic
					total_development = 75
				}
				country_event = { 
					id = DG_Papacy.207
					days = 15
				}
			}
		}
		clr_country_flag = Divided_Conclave
	}
}
country_event = { 
	id = DG_Papacy.206
	title = "DG_Papacy.206.title"
	desc = "DG_Papacy.206.desc"
	picture = catholic_schism
	is_triggered_only = yes
	fire_only_once = yes
	immediate = { 
		log = "DG:[GetYear]: Election of the Avignonist Pope"
		set_global_flag = DG_Ongoing_Western_Schism
		set_global_flag = DG_Western_Schism_Timer
		set_global_flag = DG_Live_Pope_in_Avignon
		change_tag = AVI
		hidden_effect = { 
			set_variable = { 
				which = pzs
				which = aaa
			}
			every_province = { 
				limit = { 
					AND = { 
						OR = { 
							is_city = yes
							is_colony = yes
						}
						NOT = { 
							province_id = 5154
						}
					}
				}
				clr_province_flag = TradePost@PREV
			}
			country_event = { 
				id = POP_StartInit.012
			}
			country_event = { 
				id = SYS_Post.002
			}
		}
		every_owned_province = { 
			limit = { 
				superregion = italy_superregion
			}
			add_core = PAP
			cede_province = PAP
		}

			remove_country_modifier = title_3
			remove_country_modifier = title_4
			remove_country_modifier = title_6
			add_country_modifier = { 
				name = title_5
				duration = -1
			}
			clr_country_flag = title_1
			clr_country_flag = title_2
			clr_country_flag = title_3
			clr_country_flag = title_4
			clr_country_flag = title_5
			clr_country_flag = title_6
		}
		PAP = { 
			override_country_name = PAP_Schism
			add_truce_with = AVI
		}
	}
	option = { 
		name = "DG_Papacy.205.opta"
	}
	option = { 
		name = "DG_Papacy.205.optb"
		switch_tag = PAP
	}
	after = { 
		if = { 
			limit = { 
				exists = FRA
			}
			FRA = { 
				country_event = { 
					id = DG_Papacy.207
					days = 15
				}
			}
		}
		else_if = { 
			limit = { 
				exists = KNP
			}
			KNP = { 
				country_event = { 
					id = DG_Papacy.207
					days = 15
				}
			}
		}
		else_if = { 
			limit = { 
				exists = NAP
			}
			NAP = { 
				country_event = { 
					id = DG_Papacy.207
					days = 15
				}
			}
		}
		else_if = { 
			limit = { 
				exists = ENG
				ENG = { 
					religion = catholic
				}
			}
			ENG = { 
				country_event = { 
					id = DG_Papacy.207
					days = 15
				}
			}
		}
		else = { 
			random_country = { 
				limit = { 
					religion = catholic
					total_development = 75
				}
				country_event = { 
					id = DG_Papacy.207
					days = 15
				}
			}
		}
		clr_country_flag = Divided_Conclave
	}
}
country_event = { 
	id = DG_Papacy.207
	title = "DG_Papacy.207.title"
	desc = "DG_Papacy.207.desc"

	fire_only_once = yes
	option = { 
		name = "OPT.DULYNOTED2"
		if = { 
			limit = { 
				religion = catholic
			}
			change_religion = avignonist
		}
		every_owned_province = { 
			if = { 
				limit = { 
					religion = catholic
				}
				if = { 
					limit = { 
						has_cardinal = yes
					}
					set_province_flag = dg_has_cardinal
					remove_cardinal = yes

						AAA = { 
							change_variable = {

							}
						}
					}

					limit = { 
						has_province_flag = dg_has_cardinal

						limit = { 
							OR = { 
								AND = { 
									religion = catholic

										religion = catholic
									}

									religion = avignonist

							value = 0
						}
						set_variable = { 
							which = azy
							value = 0
						}
						set_variable = { 
							which = bae
							value = 0
						}
						set_variable = { 
							which = jwl
							value = 0
						}
						set_variable = { 
							which = jxi
							value = 0
						}
						set_variable = { 
							which = kfx
							value = 0
						}
						set_variable = { 
							which = kkk
							value = 0
						}
						set_variable = { 
							which = oot
							value = 0
						}
						set_variable = { 
							which = bal
							value = 0
						}
					}
				}
				else_if = { 
					limit = { 
						AND = { 
							is_variable_equal = { 
								which = aef
								value = 1
							}
						}
					}
					set_variable = { 
						which = aef
						value = 7
					}
				}
			}
		}
		add_opinion = { 
			who = AVI
			modifier = western_schism_support
		}
		reverse_add_opinion = { 
			who = AVI
			modifier = western_schism_support
		}
		add_opinion = { 
			who = PAP
			modifier = western_schism_defiance
		}
		reverse_add_opinion = { 
			who = PAP
			modifier = western_schism_defiance
		}
		add_historical_friend = AVI
		create_guarantee = AVI
		add_historical_rival = PAP
		set_papal_controller = ROOT
		if = { 
			limit = { 
				PAP = { 
					guaranteed_by = ROOT
				}
			}
			remove_guarantee = PAP
		}
	}
	after = { 
		hidden_effect = { 
			every_known_country = { 
				limit = { 
					religion = catholic
					NOT = { 
						tag = PAP
					}
					is_subject = no
					is_emperor = no
				}
				country_event = { 
					id = DG_Papacy.208
					days = 15
				}
			}
			every_subject_country = { 
				country_event = { 
					id = DG_Papacy.209
					days = 5
				}
			}
		}
		clr_global_flag = DG_Western_Schism_Start
	}
}

	id = DG_Papacy.208
	title = "DG_Papacy.208.title"
	desc = "DG_Papacy.208.desc"

	option = { 
		name = "DG_Papacy.208.opta"
		trigger = { 
			NOT = { 
				historical_friend_with = FROM
			}
			NOT = { 
				alliance_with = FROM
			}
			NOT = { 
				overlord_of = PAP
			}

			factor = 60

					superregion = scandinavian_superregion

				is_emperor = yes
				factor = 1.7

				limit = { 
					tag = KNP
				}
				create_guarantee = AVI
			}
			every_subject_country = { 
				country_event = { 
					id = DG_Papacy.209
					days = 5
				}
			}
		}
	}
}
country_event = { 
	id = DG_Papacy.209
	title = "DG_Papacy.209.title"
	desc = "DG_Papacy.209.desc"
	picture = catholic_schism
	is_triggered_only = yes
	option = { 
		name = "OPT.DULYNOTED2"
		if = { 
			limit = { 
				religion = catholic
			}
			change_religion = avignonist
		}
		every_owned_province = { 
			if = { 
				limit = { 
					religion = catholic
				}
				if = { 
					limit = { 
						has_cardinal = yes
					}
					set_province_flag = dg_has_cardinal
					remove_cardinal = yes
					hidden_effect = { 
						AAA = { 
							change_variable = { 
								which = nje
								value = -1
							}
						}
					}
				}
				change_religion = avignonist
				if = { 
					limit = { 
						has_province_flag = dg_has_cardinal
					}
					if = { 
						limit = { 
							OR = { 
								AND = { 
									religion = catholic
									owner = { 
										religion = catholic
									}
								}
								AND = { 
									religion = avignonist
									owner = { 
										religion = avignonist
									}
								}
							}
							has_cardinal = no
							NOT = { 
								AAA = { 
									AND = { 
										check_variable = { 
											which = nje
											value = 50
										}
									}
								}
							}
						}
						add_cardinal = yes
						hidden_effect = { 
							owner = { 
								add_papal_influence = 5
							}
							AAA = { 
								change_variable = { 
									which = nje

						}
						change_variable = { 
							which = aec
							which = aeg
						}
						set_variable = { 
							which = aef
							value = 0
						}

							which = axe
							value = 0

					}

						change_variable = {

						}
						change_variable = { 
							which = aee

						}
						set_variable = {

							which = ayw

						}

							which = aer

						}
						set_variable = { 
							which = aes
							value = 0
						}
						set_variable = {

						}

							which = azy
							value = 0
						}

							which = bae

						}

							which = jwl

						}
						set_variable = { 
							which = kfx

							which = kkk

						}
						set_variable = { 
							which = oot
							value = 0
						}
						set_variable = { 
							which = bal
							value = 0
						}
					}
				}
				else_if = { 
					limit = { 
						AND = { 
							is_variable_equal = { 
								which = aef
								value = 1
							}
						}
					}
					set_variable = { 
						which = aef
						value = 7
					}
				}
			}
		}
		hidden_effect = { 
			every_subject_country = { 
				country_event = { 
					id = DG_Papacy.209
					days = 5
				}
			}
		}
	}
}
country_event = { 
	id = DG_Papacy.210
	title = "DG_Papacy.210.title"
	desc = "DG_Papacy.210.desc"
	picture = catholic_schism
	is_triggered_only = yes
	immediate = { 
		add_opinion = { 
			who = PAP
			modifier = western_schism_support
		}
		reverse_add_opinion = { 
			who = PAP
			modifier = western_schism_support
		}
		add_opinion = { 
			who = AVI
			modifier = western_schism_defiance
		}
		reverse_add_opinion = { 
			who = AVI
			modifier = western_schism_defiance
		}
	}
	option = { 
		name = "OPT.DULYNOTED2"
		create_guarantee = PAP
	}
	option = { 
		name = "DG_Papacy.210.optb"
		trigger = { 
			ai = no
		}
		add_prestige = -5
	}
}
country_event = { 
	id = DG_Papacy.221
	title = "DG_Papacy.221.title"
	desc = "DG_Papacy.221.desc"
	picture = catholic_schism
	is_triggered_only = yes
	trigger = { 
		has_global_flag = DG_Ongoing_Western_Schism
	}
	immediate = { 
		clr_global_flag = DG_Ongoing_Western_Schism
		clr_global_flag = DG_Live_Pope_In_Avignon
		set_global_flag = DG_Western_Schism_Defeated
		if = { 
			limit = { 
				NOT = { 
					has_global_flag = DG_Live_Pope_in_Rome
				}
			}
			set_global_flag = DG_Live_Pope_in_Rome
		}
	}
	option = { 
		name = "OPT.DULYNOTED2"
		clr_global_flag = DG_Ongoing_Western_Schism
		AVI = { 
			override_country_name = AVI
		}
		PAP = { 
			override_country_name = PAP
		}
		hidden_effect = { 
			202 = { 
				remove_province_modifier = papal_seat_em
			}
			2530 = { 
				remove_province_modifier = papal_seat_em
			}
			FRA = { 
				remove_historical_friend = AVI

			FRA = { 
				remove_historical_rival = PAP

				war_with = AVI

					ai = no

			AVI = { 
				switch_tag = PAP

			inherit = AVI

				limit = { 
					religion_group = christian
				}
				if = { 
					limit = { 
						religion = avignonist
					}
					change_religion = catholic
				}
				every_owned_province = { 
					if = { 
						limit = { 
							religion = avignonist
						}
						if = { 
							limit = { 
								has_cardinal = yes
							}
							remove_cardinal = yes
							hidden_effect = { 
								AAA = {

										value = -1

									which = aes

									which = aen

									}

							set_variable = {

					}

		}
	}
	after = { 
		every_province = { 
			limit = { 
				is_core = AVI
			}
			remove_core = AVI
		}
		PAP = { 
			change_government = theocracy
			add_government_reform = Pol_Organisation3
			add_government_reform = Pol_Mediumship4
			if = { 
				limit = { 
					AND = { 
						is_variable_equal = { 
							which = gri
							value = 0
						}
					}
				}
				add_government_reform = Pol_Nobility1
			}
			else_if = { 
				limit = { 
					AND = { 
						is_variable_equal = { 
							which = gri
							value = 1
						}
					}
				}
				add_government_reform = Pol_Nobility2
			}
			else_if = { 
				limit = { 
					AND = { 
						is_variable_equal = { 
							which = gri
							value = 2
						}
					}
				}
				add_government_reform = Pol_Nobility3
			}
			else_if = { 
				limit = { 
					AND = { 
						is_variable_equal = { 
							which = gri
							value = 3
						}
					}
				}
				add_government_reform = Pol_Nobility4
			}
			add_government_reform = Pol_Assembly1
			if = { 
				limit = { 
					AND = { 
						is_variable_equal = { 
							which = gqr
							value = 0
						}
					}
				}
				add_government_reform = Pol_Structure1
			}
			else_if = { 
				limit = { 
					AND = { 
						is_variable_equal = { 
							which = gqr
							value = 1
						}
					}
				}
				add_government_reform = Pol_Structure2
			}
			else_if = { 
				limit = { 
					AND = { 
						is_variable_equal = { 
							which = gqr
							value = 2
						}
					}
				}
				add_government_reform = Pol_Structure3
			}
			else_if = { 
				limit = { 
					AND = { 
						is_variable_equal = { 
							which = gqr
							value = 3
						}
					}
				}
				add_government_reform = Pol_Structure4
			}
			else_if = { 
				limit = { 
					AND = { 
						is_variable_equal = { 
							which = gqr
							value = 4
						}
					}
				}
				add_government_reform = Pol_Structure5
			}
			if = { 
				limit = { 
					AND = { 
						is_variable_equal = { 
							which = gqs
							value = 0
						}
					}
				}
				add_government_reform = Pol_Centralisation1
			}
			else_if = { 
				limit = { 
					AND = { 
						is_variable_equal = { 
							which = gqs
							value = 1
						}
					}
				}
				add_government_reform = Pol_Centralisation2
			}
			else_if = { 
				limit = { 
					AND = { 
						is_variable_equal = { 
							which = gqs
							value = 2
						}
					}
				}
				add_government_reform = Pol_Centralisation3
			}
			else_if = { 
				limit = { 
					AND = { 
						is_variable_equal = { 
							which = gqs
							value = 3
						}
					}
				}
				add_government_reform = Pol_Centralisation4
			}
			else_if = { 
				limit = { 
					AND = { 
						is_variable_equal = { 
							which = gqs
							value = 4
						}
					}
				}
				add_government_reform = Pol_Centralisation5
			}
			if = { 
				limit = { 
					AND = { 
						is_variable_equal = { 
							which = gqt
							value = 0
						}
					}
				}
				add_government_reform = Pol_Autonomy1
			}
			else_if = { 
				limit = { 
					AND = { 
						is_variable_equal = { 
							which = gqt
							value = 1
						}
					}
				}
				add_government_reform = Pol_Autonomy2
			}
			if = { 
				limit = { 
					AND = { 
						is_variable_equal = { 
							which = gqu
							value = 0
						}
					}
				}
				add_government_reform = Pol_Provincial1
			}
			else_if = { 
				limit = { 
					AND = { 
						is_variable_equal = { 
							which = gqu
							value = 1
						}
					}
				}
				add_government_reform = Pol_Provincial2
			}
			else_if = { 
				limit = { 
					AND = { 
						is_variable_equal = { 
							which = gqu
							value = 2
						}
					}
				}
				add_government_reform = Pol_Provincial3
			}
			if = { 
				limit = { 
					AND = { 
						is_variable_equal = { 
							which = gqv
							value = 0
						}
					}
				}
				add_government_reform = Pol_Military1
			}
			else_if = { 
				limit = { 
					AND = { 
						is_variable_equal = { 
							which = gqv
							value = 1
						}
					}
				}
				add_government_reform = Pol_Military2
			}
			else_if = { 
				limit = { 
					AND = { 
						is_variable_equal = { 
							which = gqv
							value = 2
						}
					}
				}
				add_government_reform = Pol_Military3
			}
			else_if = { 
				limit = { 
					AND = { 
						is_variable_equal = { 
							which = gqv
							value = 3
						}
					}
				}
				add_government_reform = Pol_Military4
			}
			add_government_reform = Pol_Privileges1
		}
	}
}
country_event = { 
	id = DG_Papacy.222
	title = "DG_Papacy.221.title"
	desc = "DG_Papacy.221.desc"
	picture = catholic_schism
	is_triggered_only = yes
	option = { 
		name = "OPT.DULYNOTED2"
	}
}
country_event = { 
	id = DG_Papacy.231
	title = "DG_Papacy.231.title"
	desc = "DG_Papacy.231.desc"
	picture = catholic_schism
	is_triggered_only = yes
	trigger = { 
		has_global_flag = DG_Ongoing_Western_Schism
	}
	immediate = { 
		clr_global_flag = DG_Ongoing_Western_Schism
		clr_global_flag = DG_Live_Pope_In_Avignon
		set_global_flag = DG_Western_Schism_Defeated
		if = { 
			limit = { 
				NOT = { 
					has_global_flag = DG_Live_Pope_in_Rome
				}
			}
			set_global_flag = DG_Live_Pope_in_Rome
		}
	}
	option = { 
		name = "OPT.DULYNOTED2"
		AVI = { 
			override_country_name = AVI
		}
		PAP = { 
			override_country_name = PAP
		}
		hidden_effect = { 
			202 = { 
				remove_province_modifier = papal_seat_em
			}
			2530 = { 
				remove_province_modifier = papal_seat_em
			}
			FRA = { 
				remove_historical_friend = AVI
			}
			FRA = { 
				remove_historical_rival = PAP
			}
		}
		every_country = { 
			limit = { 
				war_with = PAP
			}
			white_peace = PAP
		}
		if = { 
			limit = { 
				PAP = { 
					ai = no
				}
			}
			PAP = { 
				switch_tag = AVI
			}
		}
		AVI = { 
			inherit = PAP
			change_tag = PAP
			hidden_effect = { 
				set_variable = { 
					which = pzs
					which = aaa
				}
				every_province = { 
					limit = { 
						AND = { 
							OR = { 
								is_city = yes
								is_colony = yes
							}
							NOT = { 
								province_id = 5154
							}
						}
					}
					clr_province_flag = TradePost@PREV
				}
				country_event = { 
					id = POP_StartInit.012
				}
				country_event = { 
					id = SYS_Post.002
				}
			}
		}
		if = { 
			limit = { 
				religion_group = christian
			}
			if = { 
				limit = { 
					religion = avignonist
				}
				change_religion = catholic
			}
			every_owned_province = { 
				if = { 
					limit = { 
						religion = avignonist
					}
					if = { 
						limit = { 
							has_cardinal = yes
						}
						remove_cardinal = yes
						hidden_effect = { 
							AAA = { 
								change_variable = { 
									which = nje
									value = -1
								}
							}
						}
					}
					change_religion = catholic
				}
				hidden_effect = { 
					if = { 
						limit = { 
							AND = { 
								is_variable_equal = { 
									which = adv
									value = 7
								}
							}
						}
						set_variable = { 
							which = adv
							value = 1
						}
						if = { 
							limit = { 
								AND = { 
									is_variable_equal = { 
										which = adx
										value = 1
									}
								}
							}
							change_variable = { 
								which = awp
								which = aws
							}
							change_variable = { 
								which = awq
								which = awt
							}
							change_variable = { 
								which = awr
								which = awu
							}
							change_variable = { 
								which = axh
								which = axk
							}
							change_variable = { 
								which = axi
								which = axl
							}
							change_variable = { 
								which = axj
								which = axm
							}
							change_variable = { 
								which = ayl
								which = aym
							}
							change_variable = { 
								which = ayr
								which = ays
							}
							change_variable = { 
								which = aeh
								which = aej
							}
							change_variable = { 
								which = aei
								which = aek
							}
							change_variable = { 
								which = adw
								which = ady
							}
							set_variable = { 
								which = adx
								value = 0
							}
							set_variable = { 
								which = aws
								value = 0
							}
							set_variable = { 
								which = awt
								value = 0
							}
							set_variable = { 
								which = awu
								value = 0
							}
							set_variable = { 
								which = axk
								value = 0
							}
							set_variable = { 
								which = axl
								value = 0
							}
							set_variable = { 
								which = axm
								value = 0
							}
							set_variable = { 
								which = aym
								value = 0
							}
							set_variable = { 
								which = ays
								value = 0
							}
							set_variable = { 
								which = aej
								value = 0
							}
							set_variable = { 
								which = aek
								value = 0
							}
							set_variable = { 
								which = ady
								value = 0
							}
							set_variable = { 
								which = azu
								value = 0
							}
							set_variable = { 
								which = baa
								value = 0
							}
							set_variable = { 
								which = jwh
								value = 0
							}
							set_variable = { 
								which = jxe
								value = 0
							}
							set_variable = { 
								which = kft
								value = 0
							}
							set_variable = { 
								which = kkg
								value = 0
							}
							set_variable = { 
								which = oop
								value = 0
							}
							set_variable = { 
								which = bah
								value = 0
							}
						}
						else_if = {

		every_known_country = { 
			limit = { 
				religion_group = christian
			}
			if = { 
				limit = { 
					religion = avignonist
				}
				change_religion = catholic
			}
			every_owned_province = { 
				if = { 
					limit = { 
						religion = avignonist
					}
					if = { 
						limit = { 
							has_cardinal = yes
						}
						remove_cardinal = yes
						hidden_effect = { 
							AAA = { 
								change_variable = { 
									which = nje
									value = -1
								}
							}
						}
					}
					change_religion = catholic
				}
				hidden_effect = { 
					if = { 
						limit = { 
							AND = { 
								is_variable_equal = { 
									which = adv
									value = 7
								}
							}
						}
						set_variable = { 
							which = adv
							value = 1
						}
						if = { 
							limit = { 
								AND = { 
									is_variable_equal = { 
										which = adx
										value = 1
									}
								}
							}
							change_variable = { 
								which = awp
								which = aws
							}
							change_variable = { 
								which = awq
								which = awt
							}
							change_variable = { 
								which = awr
								which = awu
							}
							change_variable = { 
								which = axh
								which = axk
							}
							change_variable = { 
								which = axi

							}
							change_variable = { 
								which = axj

								which = aei

							change_variable = { 
								which = adw

							set_variable = { 
								which = adx
								value = 0
							}
							set_variable = { 
								which = aws
								value = 0
							}
							set_variable = {

	}
	after = { 
		every_province = { 
			limit = { 
				is_core = AVI
			}
			remove_core = AVI
		}
		PAP = { 
			change_government = theocracy
			add_government_reform = Pol_Organisation3
			add_government_reform = Pol_Mediumship4
			if = { 
				limit = { 
					AND = { 
						is_variable_equal = { 
							which = gri
							value = 0
						}
					}
				}
				add_government_reform = Pol_Nobility1
			}
			else_if = { 
				limit = { 
					AND = { 
						is_variable_equal = { 
							which = gri
							value = 1
						}
					}
				}
				add_government_reform = Pol_Nobility2
			}
			else_if = { 
				limit = { 
					AND = { 
						is_variable_equal = { 
							which = gri
							value = 2
						}
					}
				}
				add_government_reform = Pol_Nobility3
			}
			else_if = { 
				limit = { 
					AND = { 
						is_variable_equal = { 
							which = gri
							value = 3
						}
					}
				}
				add_government_reform = Pol_Nobility4
			}
			add_government_reform = Pol_Assembly1
			if = { 
				limit = { 
					AND = { 
						is_variable_equal = { 
							which = gqr
							value = 0
						}
					}
				}
				add_government_reform = Pol_Structure1
			}
			else_if = { 
				limit = { 
					AND = { 
						is_variable_equal = { 
							which = gqr
							value = 1
						}
					}
				}
				add_government_reform = Pol_Structure2
			}
			else_if = { 
				limit = { 
					AND = { 
						is_variable_equal = { 
							which = gqr
							value = 2
						}
					}
				}
				add_government_reform = Pol_Structure3
			}
			else_if = { 
				limit = { 
					AND = { 
						is_variable_equal = { 
							which = gqr
							value = 3
						}
					}
				}
				add_government_reform = Pol_Structure4
			}
			else_if = { 
				limit = { 
					AND = { 
						is_variable_equal = { 
							which = gqr
							value = 4
						}
					}
				}
				add_government_reform = Pol_Structure5
			}
			if = { 
				limit = { 
					AND = { 
						is_variable_equal = { 
							which = gqs
							value = 0
						}
					}
				}
				add_government_reform = Pol_Centralisation1
			}
			else_if = { 
				limit = { 
					AND = { 
						is_variable_equal = { 
							which = gqs
							value = 1
						}
					}
				}
				add_government_reform = Pol_Centralisation2
			}
			else_if = { 
				limit = { 
					AND = { 
						is_variable_equal = { 
							which = gqs
							value = 2
						}
					}
				}
				add_government_reform = Pol_Centralisation3
			}
			else_if = { 
				limit = { 
					AND = { 
						is_variable_equal = { 
							which = gqs
							value = 3
						}
					}
				}
				add_government_reform = Pol_Centralisation4
			}
			else_if = { 
				limit = { 
					AND = { 
						is_variable_equal = { 
							which = gqs
							value = 4
						}
					}
				}
				add_government_reform = Pol_Centralisation5
			}
			if = { 
				limit = { 
					AND = { 
						is_variable_equal = { 
							which = gqt
							value = 0
						}
					}
				}
				add_government_reform = Pol_Autonomy1
			}
			else_if = { 
				limit = { 
					AND = { 
						is_variable_equal = { 
							which = gqt
							value = 1
						}
					}
				}
				add_government_reform = Pol_Autonomy2
			}
			if = { 
				limit = { 
					AND = { 
						is_variable_equal = { 
							which = gqu
							value = 0
						}
					}
				}
				add_government_reform = Pol_Provincial1
			}
			else_if = { 
				limit = { 
					AND = { 
						is_variable_equal = { 
							which = gqu
							value = 1
						}
					}
				}
				add_government_reform = Pol_Provincial2
			}
			else_if = { 
				limit = { 
					AND = { 
						is_variable_equal = { 
							which = gqu
							value = 2
						}
					}
				}
				add_government_reform = Pol_Provincial3
			}
			if = { 
				limit = { 
					AND = { 
						is_variable_equal = { 
							which = gqv
							value = 0
						}
					}
				}
				add_government_reform = Pol_Military1
			}
			else_if = { 
				limit = { 
					AND = { 
						is_variable_equal = { 
							which = gqv
							value = 1
						}
					}
				}
				add_government_reform = Pol_Military2
			}
			else_if = { 
				limit = { 
					AND = { 
						is_variable_equal = { 
							which = gqv
							value = 2
						}
					}
				}
				add_government_reform = Pol_Military3
			}
			else_if = { 
				limit = { 
					AND = { 
						is_variable_equal = { 
							which = gqv
							value = 3
						}
					}
				}
				add_government_reform = Pol_Military4
			}
			add_government_reform = Pol_Privileges1
		}
	}
}

province_event = { 
	id = DG_Papacy.241
	title = "AI_Event"
	desc = "AI_Event"
	picture = catholic_schism
	hidden = yes
	trigger = { 
		is_part_of_hre = yes
		OR = { 
			AND = { 
				had_global_flag = { 
					flag = DG_Ongoing_Western_Schism
					days = 5475
				}
				religion_years = { 
					hussite = 10
				}
			}
			AND = { 
				religion_years = { 
					hussite = 15
				}
				NOT = { 
					has_global_flag = DG_Jan_Hus_Fate
				}
			}
		}
		NOT = { 
			emperor = { 
				has_ruler_flag = aborted_schism_council
			}
		}
		NOT = { 
			has_global_flag = DG_Ongoing_Schism_Council
		}
		NOT = { 
			emperor = { 
				has_ruler_flag = western_schism_council
			}
		}
	}
	mean_time_to_happen = { 
		years = 10
		modifier = { 
			factor = 0.85
			religion_years = { 
				hussite = 15
			}
		}
		modifier = { 
			factor = 0.7
			religion_years = { 
				hussite = 20
			}
		}
		modifier = { 
			factor = 0.5
			religion_years = { 
				hussite = 25
			}
		}
		modifier = { 
			factor = 0.90
			had_global_flag = { 
				flag = DG_Ongoing_Western_Schism
				days = 7300
			}
		}
		modifier = { 
			factor = 0.80
			had_global_flag = { 
				flag = DG_Ongoing_Western_Schism
				days = 10950
			}
		}
		modifier = { 
			factor = 0.70
			had_global_flag = { 
				flag = DG_Ongoing_Western_Schism
				days = 14600
			}
		}
		modifier = { 
			factor = 0.50
			had_global_flag = { 
				flag = DG_Ongoing_Western_Schism
				days = 18250
			}
		}
		modifier = { 
			factor = 2.00
			NOT = { 
				owner = { 
					government = theocracy
				}
			}
		}
	}
	immediate = { 
		set_global_flag = DG_Ongoing_Schism_Council
		set_global_flag = DG_Schism_Council_Start
		if = { 
			limit = { 
				has_global_flag = DG_Aborted_Schism_Council
			}
			clr_global_flag = DG_Aborted_Schism_Council
			set_global_flag = DG_New_Schism_Council
		}
	}
	option = { 
		name = "AI_Event"
		save_global_event_target_as = western_schism_site
		PAP = { 
			export_to_variable = { 
				which = western_schism_year
				value = trigger_value:is_year
			}
		}
		emperor = { 
			country_event = { 
				id = DG_Papacy.242
			}
		}
	}
}
country_event = { 
	id = DG_Papacy.242
	title = "DG_Papacy.242.title"
	desc = "DG_Papacy.242.desc"
	picture = catholic_schism
	is_triggered_only = yes
	option = { 
		name = "DG_Papacy.242.opta"
		every_known_country = { 
			limit = { 
				OR = { 
					religion = catholic
					religion = avignonist
				}
				is_emperor = no
				num_of_cardinals = 1
			}
			country_event = { 
				id = DG_Papacy.243
				days = 25
				random = 5
			}
		}
		hidden_effect = { 
			if = { 
				limit = { 
					has_global_flag = DG_Ongoing_Western_Schism
				}
				PAP = { 
					country_event = { 
						id = DG_Papacy.244
						days = 45
						random = 5
					}
				}
				AVI = { 
					country_event = { 
						id = DG_Papacy.244
						days = 75
						random = 5
					}
				}
			}
			set_variable = { 
				which = council_participants
				value = 1
			}
			country_event = { 
				id = DG_Papacy.245
				days = 150
			}
			set_country_flag = schism_council_participation
		}
	}
	option = { 
		name = "DG_Papacy.242.optb"
		trigger = { 
			ai = no
		}
		clr_global_flag = DG_Ongoing_Schism_Council
	}
}

				has_country_flag = abdicating_pope
			}
		}
		emperor = {

				id = DG_Papacy.247
				days = 15
			}
		}
	}

		name = "AI_Event"
		trigger = { 
			PAP = {

			}

country_event = { 
	id = DG_Papacy.247
	title = "DG_Papacy.247.title"
	desc = "DG_Papacy.247.desc"
	picture = catholic_schism
	is_triggered_only = yes
	trigger = { 
		has_global_flag = DG_Ongoing_Western_Schism
	}
	immediate = { 
		clr_global_flag = DG_Ongoing_Western_Schism
		clr_global_flag = DG_Live_Pope_In_Avignon
		set_global_flag = DG_Western_Schism_Abdication
		if = { 
			limit = { 
				NOT = { 
					has_global_flag = DG_Live_Pope_in_Rome
				}
			}
			set_global_flag = DG_Live_Pope_in_Rome
		}
	}
	option = { 
		name = "OPT.DULYNOTED2"
		clr_global_flag = DG_Ongoing_Western_Schism
		AVI = { 
			restore_country_name = yes
		}
		PAP = { 
			restore_country_name = yes
		}
		hidden_effect = { 
			202 = { 
				remove_province_modifier = papal_seat_em
			}
			2530 = { 
				remove_province_modifier = papal_seat_em
			}
			FRA = { 
				remove_historical_friend = AVI
			}
			FRA = { 
				remove_historical_rival = PAP
			}
		}
		every_country = { 
			limit = { 
				war_with = AVI
			}
			white_peace = AVI
		}
		if = { 
			limit = { 
				AVI = { 
					ai = no
				}
			}
			AVI = { 
				switch_tag = PAP
			}
		}
		PAP = { 
			inherit = AVI
		}
		if = { 
			limit = { 
				religion_group = christian
			}
			if = { 
				limit = { 
					religion = avignonist
				}
				change_religion = catholic
			}
			every_owned_province = { 
				if = { 
					limit = { 
						religion = avignonist
					}
					if = { 
						limit = { 
							has_cardinal = yes
						}
						set_province_flag = dg_has_cardinal
						remove_cardinal = yes
						hidden_effect = { 
							AAA = { 
								change_variable = { 
									which = nje
									value = -1
								}
							}
						}
					}
					change_religion = catholic
					if = { 
						limit = { 
							has_province_flag = dg_has_cardinal
						}
						if = { 
							limit = { 
								OR = { 
									AND = { 
										religion = catholic
										owner = { 
											religion = catholic
										}
									}
									AND = { 
										religion = avignonist
										owner = { 
											religion = avignonist
										}
									}
								}
								has_cardinal = no
								NOT = { 
									AAA = { 
										AND = { 
											check_variable = { 
												which = nje
												value = 50
											}
										}
									}
								}
							}
							add_cardinal = yes
							hidden_effect = { 
								owner = { 
									add_papal_influence = 5
								}
								AAA = { 
									change_variable = { 
										which = nje
										value = 1
									}
								}
							}
						}
						clr_province_flag = dg_has_cardinal
					}
				}
				hidden_effect = { 
					if = { 
						limit = { 
							AND = { 
								is_variable_equal = { 
									which = adv
									value = 7
								}
							}
						}
						set_variable = { 
							which = adv
							value = 1
						}
						if = { 
							limit = { 
								AND = { 
									is_variable_equal = { 
										which = adx
										value = 1
									}
								}
							}
							change_variable = { 
								which = awp
								which = aws
							}
							change_variable = { 
								which = awq
								which = awt
							}
							change_variable = { 
								which = awr
								which = awu
							}
							change_variable = { 
								which = axh
								which = axk
							}
							change_variable = { 
								which = axi
								which = axl
							}
							change_variable = { 
								which = axj
								which = axm
							}
							change_variable = { 
								which = ayl
								which = aym
							}
							change_variable = { 
								which = ayr
								which = ays
							}
							change_variable = { 
								which = aeh
								which = aej
							}
							change_variable = { 
								which = aei
								which = aek
							}
							change_variable = { 
								which = adw
								which = ady
							}
							set_variable = { 
								which = adx
								value = 0
							}
							set_variable = { 
								which = aws
								value = 0
							}
							set_variable = { 
								which = awt
								value = 0
							}
							set_variable = { 
								which = awu
								value = 0
							}
							set_variable = { 
								which = axk
								value = 0
							}
							set_variable = { 
								which = axl
								value = 0
							}
							set_variable = { 
								which = axm
								value = 0
							}
							set_variable = { 
								which = aym
								value = 0
							}
							set_variable = { 
								which = ays
								value = 0
							}
							set_variable = { 
								which = aej
								value = 0
							}
							set_variable = { 
								which = aek
								value = 0
							}
							set_variable = { 
								which = ady
								value = 0
							}
							set_variable = { 
								which = azu
								value = 0
							}
							set_variable = { 
								which = baa
								value = 0
							}
							set_variable = { 
								which = jwh
								value = 0
							}
							set_variable = { 
								which = jxe
								value = 0
							}
							set_variable = { 
								which = kft
								value = 0
							}
							set_variable = { 
								which = kkg
								value = 0
							}
							set_variable = {

								value = 0
							}
							set_variable = { 
								which = bah
								value = 0
							}

							limit = { 
								AND = {

										which = adz
										value = 1
									}
								}
							}
							change_variable = { 
								which = awp
								which = awv
							}
							change_variable = { 
								which = awq
								which = aww
							}
							change_variable = { 
								which = awr
								which = awx
							}
							change_variable = { 
								which = axh
								which = axn
							}
							change_variable = { 
								which = axi
								which = axo
							}
							change_variable = { 
								which = axj
								which = axp
							}
							change_variable = { 
								which = ayl
								which = ayn
							}
							change_variable = { 
								which = ayr
								which = ayt
							}
							change_variable = { 
								which = aeh
								which = ael
							}
							change_variable = { 
								which = aei
								which = aem
							}
							change_variable = { 
								which = adw
								which = aea
							}
							set_variable = { 
								which = adz
								value = 0
							}
							set_variable = { 
								which = awv
								value = 0
							}
							set_variable = { 
								which = aww
								value = 0
							}
							set_variable = { 
								which = awx
								value = 0

							}

							}

								value = 0

		}
		every_known_country = { 
			limit = { 
				religion_group = christian
			}
			if = { 
				limit = { 
					religion = avignonist
				}
				change_religion = catholic
			}
			every_owned_province = { 
				if = { 
					limit = { 
						religion = avignonist
					}
					if = { 
						limit = { 
							has_cardinal = yes
						}
						set_province_flag = dg_has_cardinal
						remove_cardinal = yes
						hidden_effect = { 
							AAA = { 
								change_variable = { 
									which = nje
									value = -1
								}
							}
						}
					}
					change_religion = catholic
					if = { 
						limit = { 
							has_province_flag = dg_has_cardinal
						}
						if = { 
							limit = { 
								OR = { 
									AND = { 
										religion = catholic
										owner = { 
											religion = catholic
										}
									}
									AND = { 
										religion = avignonist
										owner = { 
											religion = avignonist
										}
									}
								}
								has_cardinal = no
								NOT = { 
									AAA = { 
										AND = { 
											check_variable = { 
												which = nje
												value = 50
											}
										}
									}
								}
							}
							add_cardinal = yes
							hidden_effect = { 
								owner = { 
									add_papal_influence = 5
								}
								AAA = { 
									change_variable = { 
										which = nje
										value = 1
									}
								}
							}
						}
						clr_province_flag = dg_has_cardinal
					}
				}
				hidden_effect = { 
					if = { 
						limit = { 
							AND = { 
								is_variable_equal = { 
									which = adv
									value = 7
								}
							}
						}
						set_variable = { 
							which = adv
							value = 1
						}
						if = { 
							limit = { 
								AND = { 
									is_variable_equal = { 
										which = adx
										value = 1
									}
								}
							}
							change_variable = { 
								which = awp
								which = aws
							}
							change_variable = { 
								which = awq
								which = awt
							}
							change_variable = { 
								which = awr
								which = awu
							}
							change_variable = { 
								which = axh
								which = axk
							}
							change_variable = { 
								which = axi
								which = axl
							}
							change_variable = { 
								which = axj
								which = axm
							}
							change_variable = { 
								which = ayl
								which = aym
							}
							change_variable = { 
								which = ayr
								which = ays
							}
							change_variable = { 
								which = aeh
								which = aej
							}
							change_variable = { 
								which = aei
								which = aek
							}
							change_variable = { 
								which = adw
								which = ady
							}
							set_variable = { 
								which = adx
								value = 0
							}
							set_variable = { 
								which = aws
								value = 0
							}
							set_variable = { 
								which = awt
								value = 0
							}
							set_variable = { 
								which = awu
								value = 0
							}
							set_variable = { 
								which = axk
								value = 0
							}
							set_variable = { 
								which = axl
								value = 0
							}
							set_variable = { 
								which = axm
								value = 0
							}
							set_variable = { 
								which = aym
								value = 0
							}
							set_variable = { 
								which = ays
								value = 0
							}
							set_variable = { 
								which = aej
								value = 0
							}
							set_variable = { 
								which = aek
								value = 0
							}
							set_variable = { 
								which = ady
								value = 0
							}
							set_variable = { 
								which = azu
								value = 0
							}
							set_variable = { 
								which = baa
								value = 0
							}
							set_variable = { 
								which = jwh

							}
							set_variable = {

		every_known_country = { 
			limit = { 
				any_owned_province = { 
					OR = { 
						AND = { 
							is_variable_equal = { 
								which = adv
								value = 7
							}
						}
						AND = { 
							is_variable_equal = { 
								which = adx
								value = 7
							}
						}
						AND = { 
							is_variable_equal = { 
								which = adz
								value = 7
							}
						}
						AND = { 
							is_variable_equal = { 
								which = aeb
								value = 7
							}
						}
						AND = { 
							is_variable_equal = { 
								which = aed
								value = 7
							}
						}
						AND = { 
							is_variable_equal = { 
								which = aef
								value = 7
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
			every_owned_province = { 
				if = { 
					limit = { 
						religion = avignonist
					}
					if = { 
						limit = { 
							has_cardinal = yes
						}
						set_province_flag = dg_has_cardinal
						remove_cardinal = yes
						hidden_effect = { 
							AAA = { 
								change_variable = { 
									which = nje
									value = -1
								}
							}
						}
					}
					change_religion = catholic
					if = { 
						limit = { 
							has_province_flag = dg_has_cardinal
						}
						if = { 
							limit = { 
								OR = { 
									AND = { 
										religion = catholic
										owner = { 
											religion = catholic
										}
									}
									AND = { 
										religion = avignonist
										owner = { 
											religion = avignonist
										}
									}
								}
								has_cardinal = no
								NOT = { 
									AAA = { 
										AND = { 
											check_variable = { 
												which = nje
												value = 50
											}
										}
									}
								}
							}
							add_cardinal = yes
							hidden_effect = { 
								owner = { 
									add_papal_influence = 5
								}
								AAA = { 
									change_variable = { 
										which = nje
										value = 1
									}
								}
							}
						}
						clr_province_flag = dg_has_cardinal
					}
				}
				hidden_effect = { 
					if = { 
						limit = { 
							AND = { 
								is_variable_equal = { 
									which = adv
									value = 7
								}
							}
						}
						set_variable = { 
							which = adv
							value = 1
						}
						if = { 
							limit = { 
								AND = { 
									is_variable_equal = { 
										which = adx
										value = 1
									}
								}
							}
							change_variable = { 
								which = awp

							}
							change_variable = { 
								which = awq
								which = awt
							}
							change_variable = { 
								which = awr
								which = awu
							}
							change_variable = { 
								which = axh
								which = axk
							}
							change_variable = { 
								which = axi

							}
							change_variable = { 
								which = axj
								which = axm
							}
							change_variable = { 
								which = ayl
								which = aym
							}
							change_variable = { 
								which = ayr
								which = ays
							}
							change_variable = {

							change_variable = { 
								which = aei

							}
							change_variable = { 
								which = adw
								which = ady
							}
							set_variable = { 
								which = adx
								value = 0
							}

	}
	after = { 
		every_province = { 
			limit = { 
				is_core = AVI
			}
			remove_core = AVI
		}
		PAP = { 
			change_government = theocracy
			add_government_reform = Pol_Organisation3
			add_government_reform = Pol_Mediumship4
			if = { 
				limit = { 
					AND = { 
						is_variable_equal = { 
							which = gri
							value = 0
						}
					}
				}
				add_government_reform = Pol_Nobility1
			}
			else_if = { 
				limit = { 
					AND = { 
						is_variable_equal = { 
							which = gri
							value = 1
						}
					}
				}
				add_government_reform = Pol_Nobility2
			}
			else_if = { 
				limit = { 
					AND = { 
						is_variable_equal = { 
							which = gri
							value = 2
						}
					}
				}
				add_government_reform = Pol_Nobility3
			}
			else_if = { 
				limit = { 
					AND = { 
						is_variable_equal = { 
							which = gri
							value = 3
						}
					}
				}
				add_government_reform = Pol_Nobility4
			}
			add_government_reform = Pol_Assembly1
			if = { 
				limit = { 
					AND = { 
						is_variable_equal = { 
							which = gqr
							value = 0
						}
					}
				}
				add_government_reform = Pol_Structure1
			}
			else_if = { 
				limit = { 
					AND = { 
						is_variable_equal = { 
							which = gqr
							value = 1
						}
					}
				}
				add_government_reform = Pol_Structure2
			}
			else_if = { 
				limit = { 
					AND = { 
						is_variable_equal = { 
							which = gqr
							value = 2
						}
					}
				}
				add_government_reform = Pol_Structure3
			}
			else_if = { 
				limit = { 
					AND = { 
						is_variable_equal = { 
							which = gqr
							value = 3
						}
					}
				}
				add_government_reform = Pol_Structure4
			}
			else_if = { 
				limit = { 
					AND = { 
						is_variable_equal = { 
							which = gqr
							value = 4
						}
					}
				}
				add_government_reform = Pol_Structure5
			}
			if = { 
				limit = { 
					AND = { 
						is_variable_equal = { 
							which = gqs
							value = 0
						}
					}
				}
				add_government_reform = Pol_Centralisation1
			}
			else_if = { 
				limit = { 
					AND = { 
						is_variable_equal = { 
							which = gqs
							value = 1
						}
					}
				}
				add_government_reform = Pol_Centralisation2
			}
			else_if = { 
				limit = { 
					AND = { 
						is_variable_equal = { 
							which = gqs
							value = 2
						}
					}
				}
				add_government_reform = Pol_Centralisation3
			}
			else_if = { 
				limit = { 
					AND = { 
						is_variable_equal = { 
							which = gqs
							value = 3
						}
					}
				}
				add_government_reform = Pol_Centralisation4
			}
			else_if = { 
				limit = { 
					AND = { 
						is_variable_equal = { 
							which = gqs
							value = 4
						}
					}
				}
				add_government_reform = Pol_Centralisation5
			}
			if = { 
				limit = { 
					AND = { 
						is_variable_equal = { 
							which = gqt
							value = 0
						}
					}
				}
				add_government_reform = Pol_Autonomy1
			}
			else_if = { 
				limit = { 
					AND = { 
						is_variable_equal = { 
							which = gqt
							value = 1
						}
					}
				}
				add_government_reform = Pol_Autonomy2
			}
			if = { 
				limit = { 
					AND = { 
						is_variable_equal = { 
							which = gqu
							value = 0
						}
					}
				}
				add_government_reform = Pol_Provincial1
			}
			else_if = { 
				limit = { 
					AND = { 
						is_variable_equal = { 
							which = gqu
							value = 1
						}
					}
				}
				add_government_reform = Pol_Provincial2
			}
			else_if = { 
				limit = { 
					AND = { 
						is_variable_equal = { 
							which = gqu
							value = 2
						}
					}
				}
				add_government_reform = Pol_Provincial3
			}
			if = { 
				limit = { 
					AND = { 
						is_variable_equal = { 
							which = gqv
							value = 0
						}
					}
				}
				add_government_reform = Pol_Military1
			}
			else_if = { 
				limit = { 
					AND = { 
						is_variable_equal = { 
							which = gqv
							value = 1
						}
					}
				}
				add_government_reform = Pol_Military2
			}
			else_if = { 
				limit = { 
					AND = { 
						is_variable_equal = { 
							which = gqv
							value = 2
						}
					}
				}
				add_government_reform = Pol_Military3
			}
			else_if = { 
				limit = { 
					AND = { 
						is_variable_equal = { 
							which = gqv
							value = 3
						}
					}
				}
				add_government_reform = Pol_Military4
			}
			add_government_reform = Pol_Privileges1
		}
	}
}
country_event = { 
	id = DG_Papacy.248
	title = "DG_Papacy.247.title"
	desc = "DG_Papacy.247.desc"
	picture = catholic_schism
	is_triggered_only = yes
	option = { 
		name = "OPT.DULYNOTED2"
	}
}
country_event = { 
	id = DG_Papacy.249
	title = "DG_Papacy.249.title"
	desc = "DG_Papacy.249.desc"
	picture = catholic_schism
	is_triggered_only = yes
	trigger = { 
		has_global_flag = DG_Ongoing_Western_Schism
	}
	immediate = { 
		clr_global_flag = DG_Ongoing_Western_Schism
		clr_global_flag = DG_Live_Pope_In_Avignon
		set_global_flag = DG_Western_Schism_Abdication
		if = { 
			limit = { 
				NOT = { 
					has_global_flag = DG_Live_Pope_in_Rome
				}
			}
			set_global_flag = DG_Live_Pope_in_Rome
		}
	}
	option = { 
		name = "OPT.DULYNOTED2"
		AVI = { 
			restore_country_name = yes
		}
		PAP = { 
			restore_country_name = yes
		}
		hidden_effect = { 
			202 = { 
				remove_province_modifier = papal_seat_em
			}
			2530 = { 
				remove_province_modifier = papal_seat_em
			}
			FRA = { 
				remove_historical_friend = AVI
			}
			FRA = { 
				remove_historical_rival = PAP
			}
		}
		every_country = { 
			limit = { 
				war_with = PAP
			}
			white_peace = PAP
		}
		AVI = { 
			inherit = PAP
			change_tag = PAP
			hidden_effect = { 
				set_variable = { 
					which = pzs
					which = aaa
				}
				every_province = { 
					limit = { 
						AND = { 
							OR = { 
								is_city = yes
								is_colony = yes
							}
							NOT = { 
								province_id = 5154
							}
						}
					}
					clr_province_flag = TradePost@PREV
				}

					id = POP_StartInit.012
				}
				country_event = { 
					id = SYS_Post.002
				}
			}
		}
		if = { 
			limit = { 
				religion_group = christian
			}
			if = { 
				limit = { 
					religion = avignonist
				}
				change_religion = catholic
			}
			every_owned_province = { 
				if = { 
					limit = { 
						religion = avignonist
					}
					if = { 
						limit = { 
							has_cardinal = yes
						}
						set_province_flag = dg_has_cardinal
						remove_cardinal = yes
						hidden_effect = { 
							AAA = { 
								change_variable = { 
									which = nje
									value = -1
								}
							}
						}
					}
					change_religion = catholic
					if = { 
						limit = { 
							has_province_flag = dg_has_cardinal
						}
						if = { 
							limit = { 
								OR = { 
									AND = { 
										religion = catholic
										owner = { 
											religion = catholic
										}
									}
									AND = { 
										religion = avignonist
										owner = { 
											religion = avignonist
										}
									}
								}
								has_cardinal = no
								NOT = { 
									AAA = { 
										AND = { 
											check_variable = { 
												which = nje
												value = 50
											}
										}
									}
								}
							}
							add_cardinal = yes
							hidden_effect = { 
								owner = { 
									add_papal_influence = 5
								}
								AAA = { 
									change_variable = { 
										which = nje
										value = 1
									}
								}
							}
						}
						clr_province_flag = dg_has_cardinal
					}
				}
				hidden_effect = { 
					if = { 
						limit = { 
							AND = { 
								is_variable_equal = { 
									which = adv
									value = 7
								}
							}
						}
						set_variable = { 
							which = adv
							value = 1
						}
						if = { 
							limit = { 
								AND = { 
									is_variable_equal = {

										value = 1
									}
								}

		every_known_country = { 
			limit = { 
				religion_group = christian
			}
			if = { 
				limit = { 
					religion = avignonist
				}
				change_religion = catholic
			}
			every_owned_province = { 
				if = { 
					limit = { 
						religion = avignonist
					}
					if = { 
						limit = { 
							has_cardinal = yes
						}
						set_province_flag = dg_has_cardinal
						remove_cardinal = yes
						hidden_effect = { 
							AAA = { 
								change_variable = { 
									which = nje
									value = -1
								}
							}
						}
					}
					change_religion = catholic
					if = { 
						limit = { 
							has_province_flag = dg_has_cardinal
						}
						if = { 
							limit = { 
								OR = { 
									AND = { 
										religion = catholic
										owner = { 
											religion = catholic
										}
									}
									AND = { 
										religion = avignonist
										owner = { 
											religion = avignonist
										}
									}
								}
								has_cardinal = no
								NOT = { 
									AAA = { 
										AND = { 
											check_variable = { 
												which = nje
												value = 50
											}
										}
									}
								}
							}
							add_cardinal = yes
							hidden_effect = { 
								owner = { 
									add_papal_influence = 5
								}
								AAA = { 
									change_variable = { 
										which = nje
										value = 1
									}
								}
							}
						}
						clr_province_flag = dg_has_cardinal
					}
				}
				hidden_effect = { 
					if = { 
						limit = { 
							AND = { 
								is_variable_equal = { 
									which = adv
									value = 7
								}
							}
						}
						set_variable = { 
							which = adv
							value = 1
						}
						if = { 
							limit = { 
								AND = { 
									is_variable_equal = { 
										which = adx
										value = 1
									}
								}
							}
							change_variable = { 
								which = awp
								which = aws
							}
							change_variable = { 
								which = awq
								which = awt
							}
							change_variable = { 
								which = awr
								which = awu
							}
							change_variable = { 
								which = axh
								which = axk
							}
							change_variable = {

							}
							change_variable = { 
								which = axj

							}
							change_variable = { 
								which = ayl

							}
							change_variable = { 
								which = ayr

							}

							}

								value = 0
							}

							}

								which = bal
								value = 0
							}
						}
					}
					else_if = {
