province_event = { 
	id = DG_Papacy.906
	title = DG_Papacy.906.title
	desc = DG_Papacy.906.desc
	picture = catholic_corrupt_priest
	is_triggered_only = yes
	trigger = { 
		NOT = { 
			has_global_flag = DG_Counter_Reformation
		}
		owner = { 
			OR = { 
				religion = catholic
				religion = avignonist
			}
			NOT = { 
				tag = PAP
			}
			NOT = { 
				tag = AVI
			}
		}
		OR = { 
			has_province_modifier = preeminent_region_city
			AND = { 
				check_variable = { 
					which = aax
					value = 10
				}
			}
		}
		religion = owner
		NOT = { 
			has_province_modifier = catholic_archbishopric
		}
		NOT = { 
			has_province_modifier = greedy_bishop
		}
		NOT = { 
			has_province_modifier = effective_bishop
		}
		NOT = { 
			has_province_modifier = absentee_bishop
		}
		NOT = { 
			has_province_modifier = indulgence_peddler
		}
		NOT = { 
			has_province_modifier = religious_scandal_province
		}
	}
	option = { 
		name = DG_Papacy.906.opta
		ai_chance = { 
			factor = 70
			modifier = { 
				factor = 0.5
				has_country_flag = humanism
			}
		}
		owner = { 
			add_reform_desire = 0.00002
		}
		if = { 
			limit = { 
				owner = { 
					AND = { 
						check_variable = { 
							which = asx
							value = 80
						}
					}
				}
			}
			add_province_modifier = { 
				name = absentee_bishop
				duration = 2000
			}
		}
		else_if = { 
			limit = { 
				owner = { 
					AND = { 
						check_variable = { 
							which = asx
							value = 60
						}
					}
				}
			}
			add_province_modifier = { 
				name = absentee_bishop
				duration = 1600
			}
		}
		else_if = { 
			limit = { 
				owner = { 
					AND = { 
						check_variable = { 
							which = asx
							value = 40
						}
					}
				}
			}
			add_province_modifier = { 
				name = absentee_bishop
				duration = 1200
			}
		}
		else_if = { 
			limit = { 
				owner = { 
					AND = { 
						check_variable = { 
							which = asx
							value = 20
						}
					}
				}
			}
			add_province_modifier = { 
				name = absentee_bishop
				duration = 800
			}
		}
		else = { 
			add_province_modifier = { 
				name = absentee_bishop
				duration = 400
			}
		}
	}
	option = { 
		name = DG_Papacy.906.optb
		ai_chance = { 
			factor = 30
			modifier = { 
				factor = 0.5
				NOT = { 
					treasury = 20
				}
			}
			modifier = { 
				factor = 0.5
				num_of_loans = 1
			}
		}
		owner = { 
			add_treasury = -20
			add_adm_power = -10
		}
		owner = { 
			add_reform_desire = -0.00002
		}
		hidden_effect = { 
			owner = { 
				capital_scope = { 
					change_variable = { 
						which = aan
						value = 20
					}
					if = { 
						limit = { 
							NOT = { 
								AND = { 
									check_variable = { 
										which = aan
										value = 1.0
									}
								}
							}
						}
						set_variable = { 
							which = aan
							value = 1.0
						}
					}
					set_province_flag = POP_ChangedWealth
				}
			}
		}
	}
}
province_event = { 
	id = DG_Papacy.907
	title = DG_Papacy.907.title
	desc = DG_Papacy.907.desc
	picture = catholic_papal_nepotism
	is_triggered_only = yes
	trigger = { 
		NOT = { 
			has_global_flag = DG_Counter_Reformation
		}
		owner = { 
			OR = { 
				religion = catholic
				religion = avignonist
			}
			NOT = { 
				tag = PAP
			}
			NOT = { 
				tag = AVI
			}
		}
		OR = { 
			has_province_modifier = preeminent_region_city
			AND = { 
				check_variable = { 
					which = aax
					value = 10
				}
			}
		}
		religion = owner
		NOT = { 
			has_province_modifier = catholic_archbishopric
		}
		NOT = { 
			has_province_modifier = greedy_bishop
		}
		NOT = { 
			has_province_modifier = effective_bishop
		}
		NOT = { 
			has_province_modifier = absentee_bishop
		}
		NOT = { 
			has_province_modifier = indulgence_peddler
		}
		NOT = { 
			has_province_modifier = religious_scandal_province
		}
	}
	option = { 
		name = DG_Papacy.907.opta
		ai_chance = { 
			factor = 70
			modifier = { 
				factor = 0.5
				has_country_flag = humanism
			}
		}
		owner = { 
			add_reform_desire = 0.00002
		}
		if = { 
			limit = { 
				owner = { 
					AND = { 
						check_variable = { 
							which = asx
							value = 80
						}
					}
				}
			}
			add_province_modifier = { 
				name = religious_scandal_province
				duration = 2000
			}
		}
		else_if = { 
			limit = { 
				owner = { 
					AND = { 
						check_variable = { 
							which = asx
							value = 60
						}
					}
				}
			}
			add_province_modifier = { 
				name = religious_scandal_province
				duration = 1600
			}
		}
		else_if = { 
			limit = { 
				owner = { 
					AND = { 
						check_variable = { 
							which = asx
							value = 40
						}
					}
				}
			}
			add_province_modifier = { 
				name = religious_scandal_province
				duration = 1200
			}
		}
		else_if = { 
			limit = { 
				owner = { 
					AND = { 
						check_variable = { 
							which = asx
							value = 20
						}
					}
				}
			}
			add_province_modifier = { 
				name = religious_scandal_province
				duration = 800
			}
		}
		else = { 
			add_province_modifier = { 
				name = religious_scandal_province
				duration = 400
			}
		}
	}
	option = { 
		name = DG_Papacy.907.optb
		ai_chance = { 
			factor = 30
			modifier = { 
				AND = { 
					check_variable = { 
						which = ata
						value = 70
					}
				}
				factor = 2
			}
		}
		owner = { 
			add_adm_power = -10
			hidden_effect = { 
				every_owned_province = { 
					limit = { 
						AND = { 
							check_variable = { 
								which = asx
								value = 0.001
							}
						}
					}
					change_variable = { 
						which = ata
						value = -5
					}
					change_variable = { 
						which = atb
						value = -5
					}
					if = { 
						limit = { 
							AND = { 
								check_variable = { 
									which = ata
									value = 100.001
								}
							}
						}
						set_variable = { 
							which = ata
							value = 100
						}
					}
					else_if = { 
						limit = { 
							NOT = { 
								AND = { 
									check_variable = { 
										which = ata
										value = 0
									}
								}
							}
						}
						set_variable = { 
							which = ata
							value = 0
						}
					}
					set_province_flag = Unrest_Update
				}
			}
			custom_tooltip = POP_CLLoyProv_-5
			add_reform_desire = -0.00002
		}
	}
}
province_event = { 
	id = DG_Papacy.908
	title = DG_Papacy.908.title
	desc = DG_Papacy.908.desc
	picture = catholic_indulgences
	is_triggered_only = yes
	trigger = { 
		NOT = { 
			has_global_flag = DG_Counter_Reformation
		}
		owner = { 
			OR = { 
				religion = catholic
				religion = avignonist
			}
			NOT = { 
				tag = PAP
			}
			NOT = { 
				tag = AVI
			}
		}
		religion = owner
		NOT = { 
			has_province_modifier = catholic_archbishopric
		}
		NOT = { 
			has_province_modifier = greedy_bishop
		}
		NOT = { 
			has_province_modifier = effective_bishop
		}
		NOT = { 
			has_province_modifier = absentee_bishop
		}
		NOT = { 
			has_province_modifier = indulgence_peddler
		}
		NOT = { 
			has_province_modifier = religious_scandal_province
		}
		NOT = { 
			has_global_flag = pap_disables_indulgences_flag
		}
	}
	immediate = { 
		if = { 
			limit = { 
				owner = { 
					AND = { 
						check_variable = { 
							which = asx
							value = 80
						}
					}
				}
			}
			add_province_modifier = { 
				name = indulgence_peddler
				duration = 1000
			}
		}
		else_if = { 
			limit = { 
				owner = { 
					AND = { 
						check_variable = { 
							which = asx
							value = 60
						}
					}
				}
			}
			add_province_modifier = { 
				name = indulgence_peddler
				duration = 800
			}
		}
		else_if = { 
			limit = { 
				owner = { 
					AND = { 
						check_variable = { 
							which = asx
							value = 40
						}
					}
				}
			}
			add_province_modifier = { 
				name = indulgence_peddler
				duration = 600
			}
		}
		else_if = { 
			limit = { 
				owner = { 
					AND = { 
						check_variable = { 
							which = asx
							value = 20
						}
					}
				}
			}
			add_province_modifier = { 
				name = indulgence_peddler
				duration = 400
			}
		}
		else = { 
			add_province_modifier = { 
				name = indulgence_peddler
				duration = 200
			}
		}
	}
	option = { 
		name = DG_Papacy.908.optb
		ai_chance = { 
			factor = 50
			modifier = { 
				factor = 2
				has_country_flag = renaissance
			}
		}
		owner = { 
			add_reform_desire = 0.00002
		}
		owner = { 
			hidden_effect = { 
				every_owned_province = { 
					limit = { 
						AND = { 
							check_variable = { 
								which = asx
								value = 0.001
							}
						}
					}
					change_variable = { 
						which = ata
						value = 2.5
					}
					change_variable = { 
						which = atb
						value = 2.5
					}
					if = { 
						limit = { 
							AND = { 
								check_variable = { 
									which = ata
									value = 100.001
								}
							}
						}
						set_variable = { 
							which = ata
							value = 100
						}
					}
					else_if = { 
						limit = { 
							NOT = { 
								AND = { 
									check_variable = { 
										which = ata
										value = 0
									}
								}
							}
						}
						set_variable = { 
							which = ata
							value = 0
						}
					}
					set_province_flag = Unrest_Update
				}
			}
			custom_tooltip = POP_CLLoyProv_2.5
		}
	}
	option = { 
		name = DG_Papacy.908.optc
		ai_chance = { 
			factor = 50
			modifier = { 
				factor = 2
				has_country_flag = humanism
			}
		}
		owner = { 
			add_reform_desire = -0.00002
		}
		if = { 
			limit = { 
				owner = { 
					DIP = 6
				}
			}
			random = { 
				chance = 90
				remove_province_modifier = indulgence_peddler
			}
		}
		else_if = { 
			limit = { 
				owner = { 
					DIP = 5
				}
			}
			random = { 
				chance = 75
				remove_province_modifier = indulgence_peddler
			}
		}
		else_if = { 
			limit = { 
				owner = { 
					DIP = 4
				}
			}
			random = { 
				chance = 60
				remove_province_modifier = indulgence_peddler
			}
		}
		else_if = { 
			limit = { 
				owner = { 
					DIP = 3
				}
			}
			random = { 
				chance = 40
				remove_province_modifier = indulgence_peddler
			}
		}
		else_if = { 
			limit = { 
				owner = { 
					DIP = 2
				}
			}
			random = { 
				chance = 30
				remove_province_modifier = indulgence_peddler
			}
		}
		else = { 
			random = { 
				chance = 15
				remove_province_modifier = indulgence_peddler
			}
		}
		owner = { 
			reverse_add_opinion = { 
				who = PAP
				modifier = disobeyed_religious_leader
			}
			add_papal_influence = -5
			hidden_effect = { 
				every_owned_province = { 
					limit = { 
						AND = { 
							check_variable = { 
								which = asx
								value = 0.001
							}
						}
					}
					change_variable = { 
						which = ata
						value = -5
					}
					change_variable = { 
						which = atb
						value = -5
					}
					if = { 
						limit = { 
							AND = { 
								check_variable = { 
									which = ata
									value = 100.001
								}
							}
						}
						set_variable = { 
							which = ata
							value = 100
						}
					}
					else_if = { 
						limit = { 
							NOT = { 
								AND = { 
									check_variable = { 
										which = ata
										value = 0
									}
								}
							}
						}
						set_variable = { 
							which = ata
							value = 0
						}
					}
					set_province_flag = Unrest_Update
				}
			}
			custom_tooltip = POP_CLLoyProv_-5
		}
	}
}
country_event = { 
	id = DG_Papacy.909
	title = DG_Papacy.909.title
	desc = DG_Papacy.909.desc
	picture = catholic_church_trial
	is_triggered_only = yes
	trigger = { 
		NOT = { 
			has_global_flag = DG_Counter_Reformation
		}
		OR = { 
			religion = catholic
			religion = avignonist
		}
		NOT = { 
			government = theocracy
		}
		AND = { 
			is_variable_equal = { 
				which = bbo
				value = -1
			}
		}
		AND = { 
			check_variable = { 
				which = asx
				value = 30
			}
		}
	}
	option = { 
		name = DG_Papacy.909.opta
		ai_chance = { 
			factor = 50
			modifier = { 
				NOT = { 
					AND = { 
						check_variable = { 
							which = ata
							value = 30
						}
					}
				}
				factor = 2
			}
		}
		hidden_effect = { 
			every_owned_province = { 
				limit = { 
					AND = { 
						check_variable = { 
							which = asx
							value = 0.001
						}
					}
				}
				change_variable = { 
					which = ata
					value = 5
				}
				change_variable = { 
					which = atb
					value = 5
				}
				if = { 
					limit = { 
						AND = { 
							check_variable = { 
								which = ata
								value = 100.001
							}
						}
					}
					set_variable = { 
						which = ata
						value = 100
					}
				}
				else_if = { 
					limit = { 
						NOT = { 
							AND = { 
								check_variable = { 
									which = ata
									value = 0
								}
							}
						}
					}
					set_variable = { 
						which = ata
						value = 0
					}
				}
				set_province_flag = Unrest_Update
			}
		}
		custom_tooltip = POP_CLLoyProv_5
		add_faction_influence = { 
			faction = FC_CL
			influence = 10
		}
	}
	option = { 
		name = DG_Papacy.909.optb
		ai_chance = { 
			factor = 50
			modifier = { 
				AND = { 
					check_variable = { 
						which = ata
						value = 70
					}
				}
				factor = 2
			}
		}
		hidden_effect = { 
			every_owned_province = { 
				limit = { 
					AND = { 
						check_variable = { 
							which = asx
							value = 0.001
						}
					}
				}
				change_variable = { 
					which = ata
					value = -5
				}
				change_variable = { 
					which = atb
					value = -5
				}
				if = { 
					limit = { 
						AND = { 
							check_variable = { 
								which = ata
								value = 100.001
							}
						}
					}
					set_variable = { 
						which = ata
						value = 100
					}
				}
				else_if = { 
					limit = { 
						NOT = { 
							AND = { 
								check_variable = { 
									which = ata
									value = 0
								}
							}
						}
					}
					set_variable = { 
						which = ata
						value = 0
					}
				}
				set_province_flag = Unrest_Update
			}
		}
		custom_tooltip = POP_CLLoyProv_-5
		add_faction_influence = { 
			faction = FC_CL
			influence = -10
		}
		if = { 
			limit = { 
				religion = catholic
			}
			reverse_add_opinion = { 
				who = PAP
				modifier = disobeyed_religious_leader
			}
		}
		else_if = { 
			limit = { 
				religion = avignonist
			}
			reverse_add_opinion = { 
				who = AVI
				modifier = disobeyed_religious_leader
			}
		}
		if = { 
			limit = { 
				AND = { 
					check_variable = { 
						which = asx
						value = 60
					}
				}
			}
			add_country_modifier = { 
				name = religious_scandal_country_strong
				duration = 365
			}
		}
		else_if = { 
			limit = { 
				AND = { 
					check_variable = { 
						which = asx
						value = 40
					}
				}
			}
			add_country_modifier = { 
				name = religious_scandal_country
				duration = 365
			}
		}
		else = { 
			add_country_modifier = { 
				name = religious_scandal_country_weak
				duration = 365
			}
		}
	}
}
country_event = { 
	id = DG_Papacy.910
	title = DG_Papacy.910.title
	desc = DG_Papacy.910.desc
	picture = all_pilgrims
	is_triggered_only = yes
	trigger = { 
		NOT = { 
			is_religion_enabled = protestant
		}
		has_global_flag = renaissance
		OR = { 
			religion = catholic
			religion = avignonist
		}
		OR = { 
			any_owned_province = { 
				has_province_modifier = absentee_bishop
			}
			any_owned_province = { 
				has_province_modifier = religious_scandal_province
			}
			any_owned_province = { 
				has_province_modifier = indulgence_peddler
			}
			has_country_modifier = anticlericalism
			has_country_modifier = religious_scandal_country_strong
			has_country_modifier = religious_scandal_country
			has_country_modifier = religious_scandal_country_weak
		}
	}
	option = { 
		name = DG_Papacy.910.opta
		ai_chance = { 
			factor = 50
			modifier = { 
				AND = { 
					check_variable = { 
						which = ata
						value = 70
					}
				}
				factor = 2
			}
		}
		if = { 
			limit = { 
				AND = { 
					check_variable = { 
						which = asx
						value = 65
					}
				}
			}
			add_country_modifier = { 
				name = CL_Leverage_L
				duration = 1825
			}
		}
		else_if = { 
			limit = { 
				AND = { 
					check_variable = { 
						which = asx
						value = 35
					}
				}
			}
			add_country_modifier = { 
				name = CL_Leverage_M
				duration = 1825
			}
		}
		else = { 
			add_country_modifier = { 
				name = CL_Leverage_S
				duration = 1825
			}
		}
		custom_tooltip = CL_Leverage_effect
		hidden_effect = { 
			every_owned_province = { 
				limit = { 
					AND = { 
						check_variable = { 
							which = asx
							value = 0.001
						}
					}
				}
				change_variable = { 
					which = ata
					value = -10
				}
				change_variable = { 
					which = atb
					value = -10
				}
				if = { 
					limit = { 
						AND = { 
							check_variable = { 
								which = ata
								value = 100.001
							}
						}
					}
					set_variable = { 
						which = ata
						value = 100
					}
				}
				else_if = { 
					limit = { 
						NOT = { 
							AND = { 
								check_variable = { 
									which = ata
									value = 0
								}
							}
						}
					}
					set_variable = { 
						which = ata
						value = 0
					}
				}
				set_province_flag = Unrest_Update
			}
		}
		custom_tooltip = POP_CLLoyProv_-10
		add_country_modifier = { 
			name = religious_controversy
			duration = 1825
		}
	}
	option = { 
		name = DG_Papacy.910.optb
		ai_chance = { 
			factor = 50
			modifier = { 
				NOT = { 
					AND = { 
						check_variable = { 
							which = ata
							value = 30
						}
					}
				}
				factor = 2
			}
		}
		if = { 
			limit = { 
				AND = { 
					check_variable = { 
						which = asx
						value = 65
					}
				}
			}
			add_country_modifier = { 
				name = CL_PopularReform_L
				duration = 3650
			}
		}
		else_if = { 
			limit = { 
				AND = { 
					check_variable = { 
						which = asx
						value = 35
					}
				}
			}
			add_country_modifier = { 
				name = CL_PopularReform_M
				duration = 3650
			}
		}
		else = { 
			add_country_modifier = { 
				name = CL_PopularReform_S
				duration = 3650
			}
		}
		hidden_effect = { 
			every_owned_province = { 
				limit = { 
					AND = { 
						check_variable = { 
							which = asx
							value = 0.001
						}
					}
				}
				change_variable = { 
					which = ata
					value = 10
				}
				change_variable = { 
					which = atb
					value = 10
				}
				if = { 
					limit = { 
						AND = { 
							check_variable = { 
								which = ata
								value = 100.001
							}
						}
					}
					set_variable = { 
						which = ata
						value = 100
					}
				}
				else_if = { 
					limit = { 
						NOT = { 
							AND = { 
								check_variable = { 
									which = ata
									value = 0
								}
							}
						}
					}
					set_variable = { 
						which = ata
						value = 0
					}
				}
				set_province_flag = Unrest_Update
			}
		}
		custom_tooltip = POP_CLLoyProv_10
		add_country_modifier = { 
			name = religious_controversy
			duration = 1825
		}
	}
}
country_event = { 
	id = dg_papacy.953
	title = dg_papacy.053.t
	desc = dg_papacy.053.d
	picture = catholic_trial
	is_triggered_only = yes
	immediate = { 
		set_country_flag = constantine_donation_cf_exposed
	}
	option = { 
		name = dg_papacy.053.a
		trigger = { 
			DIP = 4
		}
		ai_chance = { 
			factor = 90
		}
		add_prestige = -5
		add_opinion = { 
			who = FROM
			modifier = disobeyed_religious_leader
		}
		reverse_add_opinion = { 
			who = FROM
			modifier = papacy_bad
		}
		FROM = { 
			add_papal_influence = -10
		}
	}
	option = { 
		name = dg_papacy.053.b
		ai_chance = { 
			factor = 10
		}
		custom_tooltip = papal_authority_lowered
		add_prestige = -20
		every_province = { 
			limit = { 
				AND = { 
					superregion = italy_superregion
					OR = { 
						region = east_italy_region
						region = west_italy_region
						region = central_italy_region
					}
				}
				is_claim = PAP
				NOT = { 
					owned_by = PAP
				}
			}
			remove_claim = PAP
		}
	}
}
country_event = { 
	id = DG_Papacy.999
	title = "DG_Papacy.999.title"
	desc = "DG_Papacy.999.desc"
	picture = catholic_college_of_cardinals
	is_triggered_only = yes
	hidden = yes
	trigger = { 
		tag = PAP
	}
	immediate = { }
	option = { 
		log = "DG:[GetYear]: :[This.nto.GetValue]:Papal Authority: :[This.GetName]"
	}
	after = { }
}
